SA14kamvchtu:4_0: kāyaḥ prasiddhaḥ paridṛśyamāno janeṣu sarveṣu sphuṭaṃ tathāpi /
SA14kamvchtu:4_1: svabhāvato vastutayā na prāpto nidarśitaḥ so 'pi ca prāptihetuḥ //
SA14kamvchtu:5_0: phalasya śreṣṭhasya ca nityabhūtaparamasya cāgryasya jinaiḥ samastaiḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:5_3: alpīyasābhyāsabalena yasyāḥ, mahānti puṇyāni hi sañcinoti /
SA14kamvchtu:5_4: utkhātamūlāni ca pāpakāni, sarvāṇi cāpādayati kṣaṇena //
SA14kamvchtu:7_0: tatrādau sūtraṃ vyācikhyāsuḥ sādhyavasāya (viṣaya-) grahaṇādau śrotṝṇāmavatāraṇārthaṃ prayojanamāha /
SA14kamvchtu:7_1: na hi prayojanamantareṇa prekṣāvān kvacit pravartate /
SA14kamvchtu:8_2: tadanantaraṃ pūrvāparayuktivirodhāpanodanāya codakaṃ prati samādhānaṃ vakṣyata ityeva nyāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:9_2: teṣāṃ chedanāt / etenāsya (granthasya) āvaraṇadvayaprahāṇaṃ tāvat prayojanaṃ nirdiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:9_4: vajrasya hi ubhe śikhare sthūle madhyaṃ ca sūkṣmam /
SA14kamvchtu:9_5: tathaiveyaṃ prajñāmitāpyādāvadhimukticaryābhūmim ante ca buddhabhūmiṃ vistareṇa nirdiśati /
SA14kamvchtu:9_7: ata eveyaṃ vajrākāravaditi / etena bhūmitritayamasyāḥ (vajracchedikāyāḥ) abhidheyo nirdiṣṭaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:11_1: taccāpi evaṃ mayā śrutam ityārabhya tena khalu āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ ityetāvatparyantaṃ deśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:12_1: aprastutābhidhānena sarvam asamañjasaṃ syāditi tannirākartuṃ sarvatrāpi prakaraṇena yojyam /
SA14kamvchtu:12_4: āryasubhūtinā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ buddhavaṃśānupacchedakatvena viditvā yathā buddhavaṃśānupacchedo bhavet tathaivādau saṃsthāpitā /
SA14kamvchtu:13_0: pratipattilakṣaṇaṃ tu bodhisattvayānasamprasthitena kathaṃ sthātavyam? ityādinā proktam /
SA14kamvchtu:14_1: tasya pratipattilakṣaṇasya sthānaṃ tāvat kasmin viṣaye bodhisattvena sthātavyam? pratipattavyam? cittaṃ pragrahītavyam? yadetat tattasya sthānamiti /
SA14kamvchtu:14_2: tadapi iha subhūte ! bodhisattvayānasamprasthitena evaṃ mayā ityādinārabhya tārakā timiram ityantimagāthāṃ yāvadabhihitam /
SA14kamvchtu:14_3: pratipattilakṣaṇaṃ tasya sthānaṃ cetyetābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ bodhisattvānāmaśeṣakaraṇīyaparipūrṇatā samprakāśitā,
SA14kamvchtu:16_0: padārthādayaśceme sāmpratamabhidhīyante- tatra evam iti śabdo 'bhyupagamādinānārtheṣu dṛśyate /
SA14kamvchtu:16_7: etenānāptapvaṃ nirākriyate / ekasmin samaye iti ekasmin kāle,
SA14kamvchtu:16_10: ekasmin kāle idaṃ śrutamanyadā anyadapi śrutamiti darśyate /
SA14kamvchtu:16_11: atha vā, ekasmin samaye bhagavān viharati sma ityuttareṇa sambadhyate /
SA14kamvchtu:16_12: aparimitāvineyānāṃ teṣāṃ hitāya anyadā anyatra viharati sma iti pratipādyate /
SA14kamvchtu:16_13: kleśaskandhamṛtyudevaputrarūpāṇāṃ caturṇāṃ mārāṇāṃ bhañjakatvānnirūktayā bhagavān iti smaryate /
SA14kamvchtu:17_1: jñānasyātha prayatnasya ṣaṇṇāṃ bhaga iti śrutiḥ //
SA14kamvchtu:18_4: tadyathā caityabhūtaḥ sa pṛthivīpradeśo bhaviṣyati ityatrāpyuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:18_7: evaṃ sati paraiḥ grāhyaṃ bhavati vacanam,
SA14kamvchtu:19_0: śrāvastīpradeśasya atyantaṃ vistīrṇatvāt kutra viharatīti sthānaniścayābhāvād jetavane ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:19_2: tadapi tāvat kasyacidaprasiddhamiti sambhāvanāyām anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:19_3: gṛhapati-anāthapiṇḍada ityanāthebhyo dayayā piṇḍadānena tathā prasiddhaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:19_4: sa khalu bhagavadarthaṃ nirantarayā ratnāni vikīrya jetuḥ rājaputrādārāmaṃ krītavān /
SA14kamvchtu:19_8: athavā śrāvastītyanena bahunāṃ madhye viharaṇāt parārthasampadabhihitā /
SA14kamvchtu:20_1: atra kaḥ sākṣīti cintyamāne mahatābhikṣusaṃghena ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:20_2: bhinnakleśā hi bhikṣavaḥ / mārādibhiḥ pratyarthibhirabhedyatvāt teṣāṃ samūhaḥ saṃghaḥ ityucyate /
SA14kamvchtu:20_4: ānubhāvastāvad darśitaḥ / kathaṃ bhūyasvamiti ced? sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhiḥ (bhikṣu) śataiḥ ityādyucyate /
SA14kamvchtu:20_6: bhikṣusaṃghāt bodhisattvānāṃ bāhulyaṃ tu teṣāmevārthāya sūtrāṇāṃ bhāṣitatvāt /
SA14kamvchtu:23_3: tatra bhikṣusaṃghastu kṛtakṛtyatvād mṛdukāruṇikatvācca sarvakālaṃ tathāgatasya pādāntike niṣadyata iti viditvā syāsnutvasaṃdarśanārthaṃ pūrvamuktaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:23_5: adhimātrakaruṇayā jagadarthakaraṇāya lokadhātuṣu viharaṇāt sarvakālaṃ bhagavataḥ pādāntike 'niṣīdanācca paścāduktāḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:24_0: atha iti tadanantaram / samaye iti niyate / etena niyatastāvat piṇḍakāla iti /
SA14kamvchtu:24_1: kālaniyatatvaṃ tu asminneva kāle piṇḍapāto grahītavya iti,
SA14kamvchtu:24_2: tadapi kimiti aparijñānāt tadarthaṃ pūrvāhṇaḥ iti vacanenābhidhīyate /
SA14kamvchtu:25_0: upavasatāṃ pravajitānāṃ ca piṇḍakālopalambhena pūrvāhṇalakṣaṇaṃ bhagavatā deśitamekāntenetyavabodhanārthaṃ kālasamaye ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:25_2: bhagavatā svecchayā kṛtamiti sambhāvyamānatvād etat padatrayamuktamiti vā /
SA14kamvchtu:25_5: anyathā svasyaiva vineyatvābhāve kathaṃ parasya vineyatā syāt /
SA14kamvchtu:25_6: cīvaramādāya ityatra cīvarādānaṃ [Vajraṭ_103] tāvat prāvaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam,
SA14kamvchtu:25_7: nāstyantasyāvakāśa iti / mahānagarī iti deśaviśeṣaḥ, śrāvastīmātravyavacchedārtham /
SA14kamvchtu:25_12: vividhavismayahetūnāmanavarataṃ pradarśanena bhagavati ca pareṣāṃ prasādotpādanārthaṃ ityetānyaparimitāni prayojanānyavagantavyāni /
SA14kamvchtu:25_13: kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ iti yaḥ khalu bhojanādibhaktakṛtyaṃ sampāditavān,
SA14kamvchtu:26_0: alpakuśalamūlebhyo nirjātā api brahmādayaḥ kavalīkārāhāravināgānnaiva bhaktakṛtyaṃ kurvanti,
SA14kamvchtu:26_1: tarhi acintyakuśalamūlanirjāto hi bhagavān (buddhaḥ) kathaṃ kuryāditi? tathā āryadharmasaṃgītau api bhāṣitam “tathāgatastu kṣutpipāsāvarjitaḥ mūtrapurīṣavirahito 'kṣīṇakāyaśca bhavati” iti /
SA14kamvchtu:26_2: satyamevaitat tathāpi yadi bhagavataḥ sa kāyo na paramārthabhūtaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:27_0: manuṣyabhāve eva vīryārambheṇa etādṛśamanuttarapadaṃ labhyata iti vineyānāmutsāhanārthaṃ manuṣyabhāvaṃ darśayitvā evaṃrūpaṃ piṇḍabhaktaṃ darśitavān /
SA14kamvchtu:27_1: ye dāyakā dānapatayaḥ teṣu piṇḍaparikarmaprakāśanena praharṣaḥ samupajāyate /
SA14kamvchtu:27_2: bhāgyavanto 'pi kiñcitkarmāvaraṇavaśāt pretādiṣu samupajātāḥ mahaujaskā yakṣādayaḥ bhagavatāṃ karanakhāmṛtena saṃspṛsṭaṃ paramākṣayadivyarasamādāya paribhuñjānāḥ paramasukhasaṃtṛptacetasa uttamāṃ samādhiṃ samavāpnuvanti /
SA14kamvchtu:28_1: kena prakāreṇa bhaktakṛtyaṃ kṛtamiti cet? tadarthaṃ paścād ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:28_2: sarvamādāya tadanu yat piṇḍapātaṃ bhaktaṃ tat paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātam /
SA14kamvchtu:28_5: athavā paścāditi yad dvitīyavāramādānaṃ tat paścādbhaktam /
SA14kamvchtu:28_7: athavā apārahṇabhaktatvena yaḥ paribhujyate piṇḍaḥ sa evamucyate /
SA14kamvchtu:29_0: ataśca dhūtaguṇavattvāt vikālabhojanaparihṛtatvācca tadviorahitametad bhaktaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:29_3: kintu pravrajitāstu svayamevānutiṣṭhanta iti nidarśayituṃ bhagavatā svayaṃ pātracīvarapratiṣṭhāpanaṃ kṛtam,
SA14kamvchtu:30_1: kriyāntrādyadhimuktasattvāśayānuvartanaṃ vā sarajaskapādābhyāṃ śayanāsanānāmanavamardanam iti śikṣāyāmādaraṃ darśayituṃ pādaprakṣālanaṃ draṣṭavyam /
SA14kamvchtu:31_2: kathaṃ dharmadeśanākāle bhagavān samāhitena īryāpathena [Vajraṭ_105] nyaṣīdaditi cet? samāhitaireva dharmo 'yaṃ jñātuṃ śrotuṃ vā śakyate nānyairiti samādhau yatnotpādāya lokāanāṃ pravartanāt /
SA14kamvchtu:32_0: pratimukhīṃ smṛtimupasthāpya iti pūrvaṃ bodhisattvāvasthāyāṃ tāvad anuttarapadaṃ prāpya yathā buddhavaṃśānupacchedaḥ syāttathāhaṃ kariṣye iti yat praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tat praṇidhānaṃ smaraṇābhimukhīkṛtamityarthaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:32_1: bhagavāṃstu buddhaḥ sadā samāhitaḥ sannapi sarvathā smṛtau viharati /
SA14kamvchtu:32_4: samaye smareṇanāpi bhagavataḥ sadā samāhitatvaṃ na virudhyate /
SA14kamvchtu:33_0: atha khalu saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ ityanena kimuktam? yatparimāṇena bhikṣusaṃghena saha bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma,
SA14kamvchtu:33_1: sa sarvaḥ dharmadeśanākāle tatra naiva sannipatitaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:33_6: loke prāyaḥ samānyapūrvakaṃ viśeṣaḥ sthāpyata iti lokaprasiddhyanurūpamubhayamāha /
SA14kamvchtu:35_2: sugata iti sambodhanam / nairātmyadvayamārgeṇa [Vajraṭ_106] samyag gata iti suṣṭhurūpeṇa gataḥ sugataḥ surūpavaditi /
SA14kamvchtu:36_0: rājādayo 'pi āśritān prajādīn yathāśakti anuparigṛhṇanti kintvatra bhagavati āścaryamityāśaṅkākāyāṃ kimāścaryamiti tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:36_2: athavā yathā pūrvakā nairātmyadva rgeṇa gatāḥ kleśajñeyāvaraṇaprahāṇamadhigatāḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:36_4: sarvalokābhyarhaṇīyatvāt, arīṇāṃ kleśānāṃ vā hantṛtvād arhan /
SA14kamvchtu:37_3: bhagavatastāvat tathāgatatvenārhattvena samyagabhisambuddhya adhigatāśeṣasampattitayā yo 'nugrahaḥ sa khalvatra āścaryamityādarśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:37_4: ṛte karuṇāṃ bhagavato 'nugrahe 'smin nāsti kiñcidanugrahakāraṇāntaramityanenābhihita eva bhavati bhagavān mahākāruṇikaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:38_0: anuparigṛhītāḥ iti abhisambuddhena bhagavatā dharmacakrapravartanākāle paripakvakuśalamūlā bodhisattvā bhūmiṣvavatāritāḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:38_2: parīnditāḥ iti aparipakvakuśalamūlānām ādikarmikāṇāmanugrahāya ta eva parīnditāḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:39_4: sthiratā- ātyantikatvāt / vyāpakatā- tadanugraheṇa tu sva- parasantatyorhitasampādanāt /
SA14kamvchtu:40_4: kiṃ tāvad dharmatāprāpaṇam? anuparigṛhītā bodhisattvā dharmatayā parānanugrāhayanti /
SA14kamvchtu:40_5: kiṃ tarhi jñaptivacanam? tvayā anye bodhisattvā anugrahītavyā ityājñāpitam,
SA14kamvchtu:43_0: tatra prajñāpāramiteyaṃ kathaṃ buddhavaṃśasya anupacchedaṃ karotīti sandehakāriṇāṃ saṃśayopacchedanārtham /
SA14kamvchtu:44_10: vikṣepanigrahastāvat samādhito vikṣiptaṃ cittaṃ vikṣepebhyo nivārya tatraiva viniyojanam /
SA14kamvchtu:45_3: suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru samyaktayā udgrahītumudyukto bhava ityarthaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:45_6: nānyebhya iti / anyathā avāṅmukha-aśuci-sacchidrabhāṇḍeṣu ambuvṛṣṭiriva [Vajraṭ_110] dharmavṛṣṭirapīyaṃ nirarthakaiva syādityarthaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:45_7: athavā ahaṃ tu kevalaṃ deśayiṣyāmi tvameva tāvad yatnataḥ pratipadyasvetyarthaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:46_1: yena bodhisattvā niryānti / tacca daśabhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ daśabhiśca bhūmibhiḥ parigṛhyate /
SA14kamvchtu:46_4: bodhisaṃprasthitena ityetāvaducyamāne bodhīnāṃ tritvādanyasyā api bodheravagamaḥ syāditi /
SA14kamvchtu:48_0: sāmprataṃ tatsthānānyabhidhīyante / tatsthānāni tāvat samāsato 'ṣṭādaśaprakārāṇi; tadyathā-
SA14kamvchtu:48_15: na ārambha ityanārambhaḥ / aho, ārabdhavīryo 'yamiti pareṇa jñāyamāne sati śraddhāmāgamya lābhasatkārādhyavasitatvam /
SA14kamvchtu:48_16: tasmād bodhisattva etebhyaḥ sarvebhyo vimucya prajahyāt /
SA14kamvchtu:49_1: yatra bodhisattvena sthātavyaṃ pratipattavyaṃ cittaṃ ca pragrahītavyamiti /
SA14kamvchtu:49_6: sarvasattvaparinirvāpaṇacittamutpādya pāramitāyogī tāvat tathāgatasya rūpakāya-dharmakāyaprāptau chandamutpādayati /
SA14kamvchtu:49_7: tataḥ ā abhimānam antimam ahaṃ-vikalpaṃ yāvadabhisamayastāntarāyebhyaścittaṃ viprakarṣate /
SA14kamvchtu:51_1: yāvat iti parimāṇam / kiṃ tatra parimāṇam? sattvasaṃgraheṇa ityuktam 'sattvadhātustu [Vajraṭ_112] aparimitaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:51_2: athāpi sattvaḥ sattva iti yastatsvabhāvaḥ taditaravyāvṛttaśabdādhyāropitārthasabhāgarūpeṇa khyātaḥ sa eva sattvena saṃgṛhyate /
SA14kamvchtu:52_0: evaṃ sāmānyato nirūpya viśeṣato darśayitumāha- aṇḍajāḥ ityādi /
SA14kamvchtu:52_6: bṛhatphalasyaikadeśaṃ bhavāgrajāṃścaṃ sattvān vihāya sarve sattvāḥ saṃjñinaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:52_13: 'sarve dharmāḥ niḥsattvāḥ'; ityanena saha vacanasyāsyāvirodhaḥ pradarśitaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:52_14: atra sattvadhāturiti sāṃvṛte satye sattvadhātustaṃ darśayituṃ yāvān ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:52_19: sa tathocyate / śrāvakāṇāṃ parinirvāṇaṃ tāvad nātra nirvāṇadhātu;
SA14kamvchtu:52_20: tasya hīnatvāt / praṇītaphale saṃvidyamāne kṛpālūnāṃ hīnaphalārthitā na khalu yuktimatī /
SA14kamvchtu:52_21: saṃvidyamāne 'pi praṇītaphale prāptumaśakyatvādevaṃ prārthyata iti cet? tvanmatānusāraṃ tāvad trividhagotratvādagotratvācca sarvaiḥ hīnaphalamapi prāptuṃ naiva śakyate /
SA14kamvchtu:53_1: atha bodhisattvagotraṃ tāvattathāvidhaṃ yadvaśatayā mahākaruṇāvegābhibhūtena (mayā) kathamidaṃ śakyamiti,
SA14kamvchtu:53_2: saṃvidyamāneṣvapareṣu parārthakāriṣu buddhabodhisattveṣu nirarthakena mayātra praṇidhānena kimiti vicārān santyajya parapratyayatāṃ ca dūrīkṛtya mahākaruṇārdraḥ jājvalyamānena duḥkhāgninā pīḍyamānaṃ jagad vilokya ahameva tārayiṣyāmīti cintayamānaḥ praṇidadhāti /
SA14kamvchtu:55_0: iti / yadyapyevam, tathāpi priyaputrasya nṛpatvāya praṇidhānamiva satyapyaprāpye praṇītaphale kathanna praṇidhānamiti /
SA14kamvchtu:56_2: sopadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau iti kasmānnoktamiti cet? duḥkhopadhiśeṣasyāprahīṇatvāttatra /
SA14kamvchtu:58_0: tasmānnāśaktārthitā (teṣām) / nikhilasattvānāṃ parinirvāpaṇāśayena anena ādāryaṃ tāvad bodhicittasyādarśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:58_2: kathaṃ yogasamāpattyā pratipattavyamiti taddeśayitumāha evam ityādi /
SA14kamvchtu:58_3: saṃvṛtau sarvasattvānāṃ parinirvāpaṇe 'pi yathā paramārthato na ko 'pi sattvaḥ bodhisattvenopalabhyate,
SA14kamvchtu:58_5: vyutthito bhūtvā na paramārthataḥ ko 'pi sattvo mayā parinirvāpitaḥ iti yaścittotpādastena gambhīratvaṃ paramārthabodhicittatvañca darśitaṃ bhavati,
SA14kamvchtu:58_6: pūrveṇa tu saṃvṛtiriti / tena vikṣepanigraheṇa kathamatra cittaṃ pragrahītavyamityādarśayitumāha- tatkasya hetoḥ? sacet iti yadītyarthaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:59_0: atha yaḥ pudgalādisaṃjñayā pravartate kiṃ sa bodhisattva iti vaktavyaḥ? sattva ityuktau punaḥ kasya hetoḥ iti praśnenetarābhirapi (saṃjñābhiḥ) na vaktavyaḥ ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:59_1: asyāyamabhiprāyaḥ- kumatibhistāvat pañcaskandhātiriktaḥ antarvyāpāravāṃścaturṇāṃ bhogānāṃ bhoktā ekaḥ puruṣa iti parikalpyate sattvaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:59_3: ye cānirvacanīyatvena pudgalamicchanti tairapi tasya skandhasvabhāvavilakṣaṇatvenābhyugatatvāt tadbalenārthāntara evābhyupeyate /
SA14kamvchtu:59_6: tatsādhakapraṇābhāvād bādhakasadbhāvācca taddraṣṭā bodhisattvo viparītābhiniveśena viparyasta eva bhavati /
SA14kamvchtu:59_7: yaḥ khalu viparyastaḥ sa kathaṃ paramārthabodhisattvaḥ?
SA14kamvchtu:60_1: tathā hi-bandha-mokṣa-mārga-hetuphalasambandhasmṛtipratyabhijñādīnāmekādhikaraṇakatve tāvat prasiddhe nairātmyavādināṃ yuṣmākaṃ mate tu yastadādhāra ekaḥ prasiddhaḥ sa nāsti kaściditi kastāvadādhāraḥ? vijñānakṣaṇānāṃ pratikṣāṇaṃ pṛthaktvāt /
SA14kamvchtu:60_2: baddho [Vajraṭ_115] devadattaḥ muktaścānyo yajñadatta iti naiva vyavasthā,
SA14kamvchtu:60_3: na cānyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati anyena kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phalamityatiprasaṅgaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:60_5: tathā hi- kartṛtvena prajñapto yo hi vijñānakṣaṇaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:60_7: akartuścaiva tasya phalena yogādakṛtābhyāgamo doṣaḥ syāt /
SA14kamvchtu:61_0: smṛtyādikaṃ a bhinnādhikaraṇakamiti na loke pratītam /
SA14kamvchtu:61_2: devadattasya cittānubhavaḥ yajñadattacittena na smaryate vā pratyabhijñāyate vā /
SA14kamvchtu:61_3: yenānubhūyate tenaiva smaryate pratyabhijñāyate veti prasiddham /
SA14kamvchtu:62_0: tatra yadi svatantrasyaikasya paramārthasato nityasya puruṣasyādhikaraṇatvaṃ sādhyate,
SA14kamvchtu:62_1: tadā tathāvidhena puruṣeṇa saha kvāpi hetoḥ sambandhāsiddheranaikāntikatvam,
SA14kamvchtu:63_1: tadā siddhasādhanam / ekasantānapravṛttatvena tena bandhanādīnāmekādhikaraṇatvamiṣyata eva /
SA14kamvchtu:64_1: api ca, yadā yatra santāne 'vidyādikaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvenāvicchinnaṃ nirantaraṃ pravartate,
SA14kamvchtu:64_2: tadā sa baddhaḥ ityucaryate, sa eva punaḥ śrutamayādikrameṇāryamārgotpādād avidyādinirodhenāśrayaparāvṛttau muktaḥ ityupacaryate /
SA14kamvchtu:64_3: ubhāvapi tau bandhamokṣau nityaikaparamārthavastuviṣayakau natarāṃ siddhau /
SA14kamvchtu:65_0: yasmin santāne śubhoo vā aśubho vā cittānubhavaḥ samutpadyate,
SA14kamvchtu:65_1: tasminneva kālāntare santatiparipākamāgamya mastuluṅgalākṣādirasāvasiktasantatiparipāka iva sukha-duḥkha-smṛtyādiphalodayo dṛṣṭāḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:65_3: naiva khalu kaścidekaḥ kartā bhoktā smartā vā /
SA14kamvchtu:65_5: na cātiprasaṅgaḥ, niyatasāmarthyavato bījāderiva kāraṇaśakteḥ pratiniyatatvāt /
SA14kamvchtu:65_6: tataśca yeṣu kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ pratiniyataḥ teṣu naiva kaścid eko 'nugataḥ bhinnāvasthaśca paridṛśyate /
SA14kamvchtu:65_9: sā tāvad hetuḥ, yā khalu bhoktrādyavasthā, sā phalamityevaṃvidho hi kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'vaśyamabhyupetavya iti /
SA14kamvchtu:65_10: anyathā tayorubhayorapyavasthayoranupapannatve parasparokārakatvābhāve vā ākāśamiva kathaṃ tāvat tāvat sidhyet bhoktrādiḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:65_12: itthaṃ pratiniyatātmanā sambandhena sukhādīnāṃ sambhavaḥ na tu sarvatra /
SA14kamvchtu:65_14: bhoktā ca syāt, kimanenādṛṣṭasvabhāvena ātmanā parikalpitena /
SA14kamvchtu:66_1: tathāpi pratyaviṣayatvād ahaṃbuddheḥ pratyakṣata evātmā sidhyatīti cet? tadapi tāvanna yujyate,
SA14kamvchtu:66_3: ahaṃbuddhau pratīyamānatve yathā khalu pratyakṣa eko nityo vibhuścātmā svasiddhāntairukalpyate tathā naivopalabhyata ityavaśyameva draṣṭavyam /
SA14kamvchtu:66_4: anyathā ahaṃbuddheryadi pratyakṣatvaṃ syāt tadā vivādamāneṣu tāvannaiva pravarteta ātmaviṣaye kaścana vivādaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:67_1: anādikālābhyāsavaśāt pratinīyateṣu rūpādiskandheṣu ekatvamadhyāropya paraṃ vyāvarttīyatumahamiti pratītiḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:68_0: kāye cāyamātmagrahaḥ, kathaṃ tarhi mama deha iti bhedamātragrahaṇamiti cet? taccātmālambane 'pi tulyam /
SA14kamvchtu:68_1: yadi cātmani ayamātmagrahaḥ, kathaṃ tarhi mama ātmā iti cintyate /
SA14kamvchtu:68_2: atha vastuto 'bhinne 'pi bhedāntaraparihāreṇa tanmātrajijñāsāyāṃ śilāputrakasya śarīravad bhedopacāreṇa grahaṇānnāsti virodha iti cet? dehālambane 'pi caitat samānam /
SA14kamvchtu:69_0: ātmā khalu viṣayaḥ punaḥ kramotpattyā virudhyata iti paścāt vakṣyate /
SA14kamvchtu:69_1: na kevalamātmagraha ātmā apitu tadviṣayo rūpādirātmāstītyapi vaktuṃ na śakyate,
SA14kamvchtu:71_2: nāsti pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca vyatiricya pramāṇamityanyatra vicāritam /
SA14kamvchtu:72_1: bādhakapramāṇaṃ tāvannirākriyate- yadyevamātmā skandhebhyo 'bhinnastadā skandhavat kṣāṇikaḥ syād athavā skandhāḥ khalvātmavannityāḥ syuḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:73_0: atha skandhebhyo bhinna ātmā iṣyate tadā sukhādināsambaddhatve na sidhyet tasya bhoktṛtvādikam /
SA14kamvchtu:73_1: tatra prayogaḥ- yo nāsti sukhaduḥkhādibhiḥ sambaddhaḥ sa nāsti kartā vā bhoktā vā,
SA14kamvchtu:73_3: yathā vandhyāputraḥ / ātmāpi tathārthakriyādibhirna kathañcanāpi sambadha iti vyāpakānupalabdhiḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:73_4: na cāyamasiddho hetuḥ, tathā hi- sukhādinā hi sambandhe sati ādhārādheyalakṣaṇo vā saṃyogalakṣaṇo vā kāryakāraṇalakṣaṇo veti pakṣatrayam /
SA14kamvchtu:74_0: na tāvat prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ, akiñcitkaratvāt / tathā hi- adhaḥprasarpaṇadharmiṇāṃ jalādīnāmadhogamanapratibandhakatvena vyavasthāpyate tāvadādhāraḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:74_1: sukhādīnāmamūrtatvānna sambhavati (teṣām) adhogamanamiti kathamiva ātmana ādhāratvamiti /
SA14kamvchtu:74_2: sthityāpi nādhāraḥ, sthiteḥ sthāturabhinnatvāt, tasyaiva kārakatvamiti? tadapi tāvanniṣidhyate /
SA14kamvchtu:74_3: sthiteḥ pṛthakatve sati sā naiva tāvatsthāturupakārikā arthāntarabhūtatvāttasyāḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:74_7: anavasthitatvāttasya, anyathā tena bhaṅga eva tasya syānna tāvadavasthānam /
SA14kamvchtu:75_2: atiprasaṅgāt / evaṃ hi sati sarvasya sarvasaṃyogahetutvam /
SA14kamvchtu:75_3: evaṃ ca naivopapadyate tāvad bhinnārthena bhinnārthasya saṃyogaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:75_5: api ca, saṃyogabalena yadi ātmā sukhī vā duḥkhī vā bhavet,
SA14kamvchtu:75_6: tadā saṃyogaikatvameva syāt, aviśiṣṭatvena pratiniyatātmabhiḥ sukhādibhirnaiva syāt sambandhaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:75_7: tata evātmanā sahaikatve sukhādinā naiva syāt kaścit sukhī vā duḥkhī vā /
SA14kamvchtu:75_8: adarśane 'pi balenābhyupagate niścaye tenaiva niścitaḥ syāttadā kiṃ tāvat saṃyogaparikalpanayā,
SA14kamvchtu:75_10: sambandhibhedena bhinnāyāmapi prajñaptau paramārthataḥ bhāvānāmabhinnasvabhāve sati kathaṃ svabhāvabhedāśritaḥ pṛthagarthakriyābhedaḥ syāditi kumatiparikalpita evāyaṃ khalu sambandhaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:76_2: avikale hetau sati na yujyate tāvat kādācitkakāryasambhavaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:76_3: aviśiṣṭatvāt / parairanādheyātiśayo 'pratibaddhasāmarthyo vā khalvātmā kathaṃ sahakārikākāraṇamapekṣyakrameṇotpādayet,
SA14kamvchtu:76_4: na hi sahakāriṇi tadapekṣā / duḥkhotpādahetutvād yadi baddhastadā sarvathā baddhatvānnaiva muktaḥ syāt,
SA14kamvchtu:76_5: tatsvabhāvāparityāgāt, parityāge vā kathaṃ nityaḥ syāt /
SA14kamvchtu:76_6: aduḥkhāvasthotpādahetutvād yadi muktastadā vimukta eva bhavenna kadācidapi baddhaḥ syāttadā kathaṃ tāvat kalpyeta ādheyanibandhanaṃ bandhamokṣatvamiti /
SA14kamvchtu:77_0: yadi caitanyādilakṣaṇatvenotpādasāmarthyena vā kartā syāttadā kartā eva sadā bhavet katha tāvad bhoktā? atha sukhādyutpādahetutvena yadi bhoktā syāttadā bhoktaiva bhavet kathaṃ tāvat kartā? kiñca kāpilaparikalpitasya (atmanaḥ) [Vajraṭ_120] sukhādibhirākāśavannirvikāratvena naiva khalu yujyate bhoktṛtvam,
SA14kamvchtu:77_2: na khalu hetumātratayā kartā vā bhoktā vā,
SA14kamvchtu:77_3: atiprasaṅgāt / tathaiva smṛtyādiṣvapi nāśrayitvamupayujyata iti yojyam /
SA14kamvchtu:78_3: na khalu nityeṣu / teṣu nāsti kasyacidapi kāryasya krameṇotpādasāmarthyam,
SA14kamvchtu:78_4: yathoktaṃ prāk / na cāpi yugapad, tathāvidhaphalotpādasamarthasvabhāvānugame phalotpādābhāvastāvanna yujyate prāgvat /
SA14kamvchtu:78_9: ata eva yāvantaḥ paraparikalpitā ākāśādayo 'kṣaṇikābhāvāste sarve arthakriyāsāmarthyahitatvād abhāvavyavahāraviṣayā ucyante paramavicakṣaṇairbauddhairiti /
SA14kamvchtu:79_1: iti nāma vyavahāre sati nāsti nāmni vivādaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:79_2: tathāpi arthakriyārthino hi prekṣāvantaḥ [Vajraṭ_121] tathāvidhānupalambhasvabhāve vandhyāputrādyaviśeṣe ca bhāvavyavahāro na yujyata ityāhuḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:79_3: ata eva nāsiddho hetuḥ / na cānaikāntikaḥ, ākāśādiṣvapi kartṛtvaprasaṅgāt /
SA14kamvchtu:79_6: vinaśvaratve sati skandhāntargatā eva pudgalāḥ prasajyeran,
SA14kamvchtu:79_8: athāvinaśvaratve tāvat skandhāntargatadharmavisadṛśatvādarthāntarā eva te bhaveyuriti doṣo 'yamuktapūrva eva /
SA14kamvchtu:81_0: pāramitāyogamadhikṛtyāha- api tu khalu punaḥ ityādi /
SA14kamvchtu:81_3: dānam ityanena trividhadānamadhikṛtya ṣaṭ pāramitā darśitāḥ na tu dānamātram /
SA14kamvchtu:81_9: prajñāyāścābhāve sa tad viparītatayā dharmaṃ deśayet /
SA14kamvchtu:82_0: dānaṃ dātavyam ityanena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu chanda-praṇidhānābhyāṃ kathaṃ sthātavyamiti nirdiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:82_1: na vastupratiṣṭhitena ityādinātra yogasamāpattyā [Vajraṭ_122] kathaṃ pratipattavyamityāveditam /
SA14kamvchtu:82_2: evaṃ hi bodhisattvena dānaṃ dātavyam ityādinā vikṣepaṃ nigṛhya kathaṃ cittaṃ pragrahītavyamityetannirdiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:82_3: tatra na vastupratiṣṭhiteneti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogasya yāthāvattvaṃ tāvannirdiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:84_0: tathā hi- paraiḥ paramārthataḥ iṣṭā vijñānavyatiriktā arthāstāvānna pratyakṣasiddhāḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:84_2: arthe sati sākāreṇa nirākāreṇa anyākāreṇa vā jñānena grahaṇamiti trayaḥ pakṣāḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:84_3: tatra tāvanna sākāreṇa citravarṇādidarśanakāle ekajñānābhinnatvādākāraṇāmapyekatvaṃ prasajyeta,
SA14kamvchtu:85_4: citrākāravyavasthāpanāyai anekajñānotpādaparikalpanayāpi jñānasya viṣayaṃ vyāpya sthitatvād grāhakajñānānāmutpādo 'pi na sambhavati,
SA14kamvchtu:86_0: anyacca, sārūpyaṃ tāvadekadeśena bhavet sarvātmanā vā /
SA14kamvchtu:86_1: tatra na tāvat sarvātmanā- arthajjñānasyāpi jaḍasvabhāvaprasaṅgāt /
SA14kamvchtu:86_3: vyāvṛttibhedenāṃśopacāre 'pi vastvādisārupyadharmāṇāṃ sarvatra [Vajraṭ_123] vidyamānatvāt sarveṇa sarvamavagamyeta /
SA14kamvchtu:86_4: atha tadutpannaṃ tatsārūpyaṃ cetyetaddvayena vedayatīti arthasārupyasya samanastarapratyayasyāpi grāhakatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:87_0: satyapi sārūpye paramārthataḥ bāhyārtho na pratyakṣasiddhaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:87_3: yattad vijñānaṃ tadevārthagrāhakamiti cet? bhavatu nāma prajñaptitaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:88_1: sūkṣmatvātteṣām / na ca saṃhitāḥ, tebhyo 'narthāntaratvāt vikalpaviṣayāṇām asattvācca /
SA14kamvchtu:88_4: anekatve saṃghātasya paramāṇureva sa syānna tvarthāntaraḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:89_2: aviśiṣṭatvāt sarvasya / ato nīlasaṃvedanamidam, na pītamiti vyavasthā na syāt,
SA14kamvchtu:89_4: viśeṣasya kasyacidabhyupagame sa eva tāvat sākāratvābhyupagamaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:89_5: pratītisvabhāvamātre tāvad viśeṣābhāvājjñānātmani nākārātiriktaṃ bhedakamanyat syāt /
SA14kamvchtu:90_0: naivānyākārapakṣaḥ, atiprasaṅgāt / evaṃ hi sati rūpaviṣayakamākāravijñānaṃ tāvat parīkṣāmarhati,
SA14kamvchtu:90_1: tathā hi- na tāvat pratyakṣato 'rthaḥ sidhyati,
SA14kamvchtu:90_2: nānumānādapi / apratyakṣasyārthasya jñānasya ca kenāpi hetunā sambandhāsiddheḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:90_5: itarat pramāṇaṃ nāsti, ato tāvannaiva sidhyati bāhyo 'rthaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:91_0: na tāvat paramārthataḥ jñānasvabhāvatā pratyakṣeṇa sidhyati,
SA14kamvchtu:92_0: nanvevaṃ kathaṃ saṃkleśavyavadāne syātāmiti cet? na,
SA14kamvchtu:92_1: tvanmate tābhyāṃ saha tasya kasyacidapi sambandhasyāsiddhatvāt /
SA14kamvchtu:92_4: sarvathā parokṣatvāttasya / parokṣeṇa saha sambandhastu na kenāpyarvāgdarśinā grahītuṃ śakyate /
SA14kamvchtu:92_10: teṣvevāyaṃ prasaṅgaḥ, na tu saṃvṛtitaḥ pratītyasamutpādavādiṣu /
SA14kamvchtu:93_0: ata eva paramārthataḥ bhāvasvabhāvasādhakaṃ kiñcidapi pramāṇaṃ nāsti,
SA14kamvchtu:93_1: astyeva ca bādhakam / ityevaṃ tāvat- yadekānekasvabhāvavigataṃ tat paramārthato niḥsvabhāvam,
SA14kamvchtu:93_5: dvayametat tatra nāsti / evaṃ tāvad rūpādyāyatanānāṃ bāhyavastūnāṃ naikatvam,
SA14kamvchtu:94_0: nānekatvamapi, tathā hi- anekasmin vibhajyamāne sati vibhaktāḥ paramāṇava eva syuḥ tataśca paurvāparyāvasthānaṃ na syānniravayavatvāt paramāṇūnām,
SA14kamvchtu:94_1: cittacaitasikavat / tato diśaṃ vyāpya avasthitā na pratibhāseran /
SA14kamvchtu:95_4: yathāsaṃkhyam anekavijñānāni yugapat pravartanta ityapi vaktuṃ na yujyate niravayavānāmamūrtānāṃ khalu paurvāparyāvasthiterayuktatvāt /
SA14kamvchtu:96_1: mithyākārāṇāṃ tatrāvabhāsyamānatvānna nānātvadoṣa iti cet? sati caivaṃ kathaṃ te tatra bhāseran mṛṣāḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:96_3: tasya jñānagatadharmatve sati mithyākārāṇāṃ śaśaviṣāṇādivadatyantābhyāvaḥ syāditi kathamavabhāseranniti /
SA14kamvchtu:97_0: tataḥ prakāśātmakākārebhyaḥ mṛṣātvenābhyupetebhyaḥ kastāvadanyaḥ jñānasvabhāvaḥ sadbhūtaste 'vaśiṣyate,
SA14kamvchtu:97_3: nīlādīnāṃ svasvabhāvād bhinnaṃ yadanyat prakāśarūpamiti sadbhūtaṃ kimapi nāti,
SA14kamvchtu:98_1: nirākārasya (mithyākārarasya) satyākārātmani (sākārātmani) jñāne kathaṃ niyamenāabhāsaḥ syāt,
SA14kamvchtu:98_2: tayostāvat tādātmyalakṣaṇo vā tadutpattilakṣaṇo vā sambandha eva nāsti /
SA14kamvchtu:98_4: atiprasaṅgāt / ata eva nāsti tāvadasiddho hetuḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:98_6: na cāpi viruddha, sapakṣe sattvāt / ata eva yathā yathārthāścityante viśīryante tathā tathā /
SA14kamvchtu:101_1: dṛśyate na ca tannāsti tathā cotpādalakṣaṇam /
SA14kamvchtu:103_0: yathaiva ārdraṃ kadalīyaskandhaṃ sārārthikaḥ puruṣu vipāṭayet /
SA14kamvchtu:103_1: bahirvā adhyātma na sāramasti tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //
SA14kamvchtu:105_0: yadi paramārthata kasyacidapi vastuno bhāvābhāvād vastupratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ na dātavyam,
SA14kamvchtu:105_1: tadā avastvabhiniveśena tu dānasya kathaiva kā,
SA14kamvchtu:105_6: tato vastuno 'bhāve 'pi tāvadabhiniveśo na yujyata evetyabhiprāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:105_7: na rūpapratiṣṭhitena ityādinā bodhisattvena na kvacitpratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ dātavyamityeva vistareṇābhihitam /
SA14kamvchtu:106_3: anutpādādayo vikalpā api na karaṇīyā iti nidarśanārtha subhūte,
SA14kamvchtu:106_4: yathā ityādyuktam / nimittaṃ tu vastusvalakṣaṇaṃ liṅgaṃ vānutpādādi,
SA14kamvchtu:106_6: ata eva na kvacit pratiṣṭhitena iti nirdiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:107_5: prathamapakṣe kenāpi kasyacidapi deyasyābhāvāt puṇyābhāvaḥ prasajyate,
SA14kamvchtu:107_6: (dvitīyapakṣe tāvat) bodhisattvaiḥ yo hi sattvārthaṃ śrama āsthitaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:108_2: na ca viṣayasyāpyabhāvaḥ / anyathā kathaṃ bhagavatārthijanebhyaḥ putrādayaḥ pradattā iti sarvāṇyetāni codyāni manasi nidhāya tatkasya hetoḥ? iti pṛcchāyāṃ yaḥ subhūte,
SA14kamvchtu:109_0: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- samyagdṛṭivihitāni dānādīni suviśuddhatayā viśiṣṭeṣṭaphalāni abhinirvartayanti,
SA14kamvchtu:109_10: ata eva anupalambhapratiṣṭhitāni dānādīni samyagdṛṣṭisambhūtānīti vipaścitsu prasādātiśayaṃ janayanti,
SA14kamvchtu:110_0: tataśca dānādiṣvapravṛttatayā puṇyābhāvo deyādīnāṃ caikāntābhāvo neṣyate,
SA14kamvchtu:110_4: tadā dānādiṣu pravṛttirnābhyupeyate prayogāvasthāyāṃ [Vajraṭ_129] vyutthitāvasthāyāṃ vā kriyayopālambho na yujyate /
SA14kamvchtu:112_6: tadabhāvānna rūpapratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ dātavyamiti bodhisattvaḥ tathāgatarūpakāyāptikāmanayā dānādiṣu kathaṃ pravarteteti cediti codyamāśaṅkaya tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādinā rūpakāyāptikāmatā sthānaṃ nirdiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:112_8: lakṣaṇasampadā iti nimittamātrābhidhānena tathāgatasya nikhilo rūpakāyaḥ lakṣaṇānuvyañjanairalaṅkṛtaḥ paridīpitaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:113_0: tatra lakṣaṇāni tāvat cakrāṅkahastapādatādīni dvātriṃśat padabāhulyabhiyā nollikhyante,
SA14kamvchtu:113_5: ata eva tathāvidhe rūpakāye chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti nirdeśaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:114_0: athemāni lakṣaṇāni paramāṇusañcayasvabhāvāni vā tadārabdhāvayavirūpāṇi vā bhaveyuriti? na tāvat prathamaḥ pakṣa,
SA14kamvchtu:114_5: etad vicintya subhūtirāha no hīdam iti vyaktīkṛtam /
SA14kamvchtu:115_0: yadi lakṣaṇāni mṛṣā bhaveyustarhi kathaṃ bhagavatā tattatsūtreṣu lakṣaṇāni samupadiṣṭānīti cintayan tatkasya hetoḥ iti pṛṣṭvaivaṃ saivālakṣaṇasampad ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:116_3: yathoktameva pūrvam / yāvallakṣaṇasampad iti tadvīparītatayā abhihitetyavagantavyam /
SA14kamvchtu:118_2: tatrānāgate puruṣeṣu pañcakaṣāyāṇāmādhikyādevaṃvidhadharmaratnasya atyantagambhīrodāraphalatvāt pravacanadharmakāye 'nāptatvāśaṅkayā asti iti pṛṣṭavān /
SA14kamvchtu:118_3: asti iti padaṃ tu kecit sattvāḥ ye imeṣvevaṃrūpeṣu sūtrāntapadeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu bhūtasaṃjñāmutpādayiṣyanti ityarthapadena yojyam /
SA14kamvchtu:118_4: paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyām ityatra śatānāṃ pañcakaṃ pañcaśatī,
SA14kamvchtu:119_1: evaṃ iti gambhīrodārārthaḥ / sūtrāntapadeṣu iti sūtrāntadeśanāvācaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:119_5: asmin kathane 'evam'; ityanena tāvad gambhīraudārye yojanīye /
SA14kamvchtu:119_8: arthato 'viparyayastasaṃjñaivātra bhūtasaṃjñetyabhidhīyate na tu śabdābhiniveśamātram 'ayaṃ bhūtaḥ';
SA14kamvchtu:119_9: iti saṃjñā / anena tāvadarthasiddhau abhūtasaṃjñā nirākriyate /
SA14kamvchtu:120_0: sarvatrāpratihatajñānena tān bhāvinaḥ (sattvān) pratyakṣavad dṛṣṭavā bhagavān sūbhūtisaśayaṃ parihartuṃ bhaviṣyanti ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:120_2: te 'pi yathā pratipannāḥ, yādṛśena ca hetunā sampratipannāḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:120_4: yathā vā bhūtasaṃjñayā saṃjñitāstān bhagavān paridīpitaṃvān /
SA14kamvchtu:120_5: śīlavantaḥ guṇavantaḥ prajñāvantaśca ityanena tu kramaśo 'dhiśīlādhicittādhiprajñāśceti śikṣātrayapratiprattisamanvitāḥ nirdiṣṭāḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:121_0: kleśavati paścimakāle tu kathaṃ tathāvidhaśīlādiguṇavanto bhaviṣyantīti cintayitvā sūbhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:121_3: avaropitakuśalamūlāḥ tāvadavavādamanuśāsanīṃ ca śirasādāya śīlādiguṇasampadbhyaḥ prayatnavanto draṣṭavyāḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:121_4: teṣāṃ tato 'pi bahutaraṃ puṇyamabhidhātuṃ anekabuddhaśatasahasraḥ ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:122_3: anyathā sarveṣāṃ jñānāt jñānāt sarvajño bhagavāniti deśanayā ko viśeṣo darśito bhavet,
SA14kamvchtu:122_4: athavā tatteṣāṃ bhavyatvaṃ yat tatpramukhaṃ kṛtvā deśanā pravartitetyavagantavyam /
SA14kamvchtu:122_6: atasteṣāmaśeṣaṃ puṇyaskandhasaṅgrahaṃ darśayituṃ sarve te sattvāḥ ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:123_0: ebhiḥ sarvairabhūtasaṃjñāṃ nirākṛtya bhūtasaṃgyotpādane chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamityādarśitaṃ tathā sthānasyāsyaudāryamapi paridīpitam /
SA14kamvchtu:123_1: tatkasya hetoḥ? te anekabuddhaśatasahasraparyupāsitāḥ kathaṃ jñāsyanta iti jñāpakahetau paripṛṣṭe 'tra teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:123_2: anena tavat yogasamāpattau kathaṃ pratittavyamityetat prakāśitam,
SA14kamvchtu:124_4: yadi nāsti ātmādisaṃjñā tarhi kiṃ śrāvakādivad asti rūpādidharmasaṃjñā? iti cintāyāṃ na dharmasaṃjñā ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:125_1: atha kim ucchedavādināmiva abhāvasaṃjñā? iti cintāyāṃ evaṃ nādharmasaṃjñā pravartate ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:125_2: saṃvṛtau avicāraramaṇīyatayā dharmāṇāṃ sadbhāvāt saṃvṛtipathasthitebhyastāvad adharmasaṃjñā naiva yuktimatī,
SA14kamvchtu:125_4: tanniṣedhānna kaścid dharma upalabhyate yatrādharmasaṃjñā pravarteta,
SA14kamvchtu:125_5: dharmāgrahaṇe tadabhāvāt / viṣayābhāvaniṣedhastu na kutrāpi sambhavati,
SA14kamvchtu:125_6: tadyathā satye 'pi vijñaptimātre vijñaptimātrateyamiti vikalpayan na vijñaptimātratāyāṃ sthitaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:126_0: yadyātmādīnāmasattvaṃ tadā tatra tatsaṃjñāyā apravṛtau satyāṃ 'ātmaiva rūpamidam';
SA14kamvchtu:126_1: ityādikaṃ nāmamātramiti nāmābhiniveśasaṃjñā teṣāṃ bhavediti matvā saṃjñāpi ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:127_0: yadyevaṃ tarhi tasyāmavasthāyāṃ sarvasaṃjñāvigamād mṛta-nirodhasamāpannapudgalavad yogino 'bhāva eva syāditi nāpi.
SA14kamvchtu:127_2: yena te yogino bhavanti, tacca yogijñānaṃ tathyasaṃvṛtisvabhāvamiti /
SA14kamvchtu:127_5: yad yogijñānaṃ saṃvṛtisvabhāvaṃ tat kenāvagamyata iti cet? tenaiva hetunā /
SA14kamvchtu:127_7: atrāpi tattulyam / jñānaṃ saṃvittiśca na saṃvṛtau nābhyupagamyete /
SA14kamvchtu:128_1: katha tarhi? niḥsvabhāvatāvicāreṇa tadgocarībhūtānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sāmānyena nairātmasaṅgrahāt yā khalu vyavasthā saiva yugapadulambhanam /
SA14kamvchtu:128_6: tasmāt sati nairātmyadvayāvabodhe teṣāmanekaśatasahasrabuddhānāṃ paryupāsanaṃ pratīyate /
SA14kamvchtu:128_8: sa tu saṃsāre na ucito bhavatītyabhiprāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:128_9: anayā yogasamāpattyā kathaṃ pratipattavyaṃ kīdṛśyā ca bhūtasaṃjñayā tat saṃjñātavyamiti saṃdarśitaṃ tadgāmbhīryamityapi ca paridīpitam /
SA14kamvchtu:129_0: ātmādīnāmasattve teṣāmātmādisaṃjñāyā abhāvāt padasamudāyādibhiḥ ātmatva sūktaṃ duraktaṃ ca lakṣaṇaṃ dharmādharmasaṃjñaṃ kiṃ teṣu niyamena na pravartate? naivam,
SA14kamvchtu:129_1: yadi bodhisattvānā na bhavet tatra saṃjñā,
SA14kamvchtu:129_2: (tarhi) ayuktayupapannatīrthakaradharmān parityajya bhagavaddeśiteṣu dharmeṣu tadadhigamāya kathaṃ chanda utpādanīya ityāśaṅkāyāṃ tatkasya hetoḥ? iti tatsamādhānāya sacet subhūte ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:130_0: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- ekānekasvabhāvavicāreṇa yathā rūpādilakṣaṇadharmā na saṃvidyante,
SA14kamvchtu:130_1: tathā deśanādharmā api / yatra dharmasaṃjñā tatrātmādisaṃjñā api niścayena naiva prahīṇā,
SA14kamvchtu:130_3: dharmanimittagrāhakamanasikārasya [Vajraṭ_136] tasyā eva manasikārarūpatvāt maitrīprabhṛtiṣu tattvamanasikārāsadbhāve nātmadṛṣṭiḥ parihīyate /
SA14kamvchtu:131_0: api ca, bodhisattvānāṃ sā dharmasaṃjñā yadyavaśyamanutpannadarśanamārgaḥ syāt tathā sati tena kathamātmādisaṃjñā prahīṇā syāt? darśanamārgapraheyatvāttasyāḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:131_1: ataḥ sarvametat parīkṣya sa eva teṣāmātmagrāho bhavet ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:131_3: anyathā tayorbhinnākāratvāt kathaṃ dharmasaṃjñaiva ātmagrāhaḥ syāditi /
SA14kamvchtu:131_5: evaṃ sati tattatsūtreṣu kathaṃ bhagavatā bodhisattvebhyaḥ saddharmaḥ parigrāhayiṣyate? evamanucintya tatkasya hetoḥ? iti paripapraccha /
SA14kamvchtu:131_9: abhipretasiddhyarthaṃ kolopamadeśitasya lakṣaṇasya na grahaṇaniṣedha ityabhiprāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:132_0: tasmāt ityādinā sa evārthaḥ padāntarai prayuktaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:132_1: yato hi sarvo dharmo 'dharmaśca satya ityabhiniveśasya viparītābhiniveśatvād,
SA14kamvchtu:132_2: yuktyopapanno ya āgamasamūhaḥ saṃsārārṇavottaraṇāya proktaḥ kolopamaḥ sa (yadā) pāraṃ gatvā niṣprayojanatvāt parityājyo bhavati,
SA14kamvchtu:132_5: anyathā dharmādharmādikaṃ yadi satyasvabhāvaṃ syāt tadā paramārthaviṣayatvāt tadabhiniveśasya saṃsārapāragateṣvapi yuktisahaṃ [Vajraṭ_137] syāditi,
SA14kamvchtu:132_6: kimiti tathāgataḥ tanniṣedhatīti? iti tu saṃgrahārthaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:134_4: tena prasiddhaviruddhāḥ adharmalakṣaṇāḥ paraparikalpitā ātmādayaśca upadiṣṭāste 'pi saṃgṛhyante /
SA14kamvchtu:134_6: anena tāvad vikṣepaṃ nīgṛhya kathaṃ cittaṃ pragrahītavyamityetad darśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:135_2: tadā abhisambuddho bhūtvā 'bhagavatā sarve dharmā deśitāḥ';
SA14kamvchtu:135_3: iti tadapi mṛṣaiva syāt, ata eva bodhisattvaiḥ tathāgatajñānahetumadhigamadharmakāyaṃ prāptuṃ chando na janayitavyaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:135_4: ityetad vicārya jñānahetudharmakāyāvāptaye chandotpādanāya tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityaktam /
SA14kamvchtu:136_0: anenārthataḥ paramārthastu anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiriti abhisambuddha ityetayoḥ [Vajraṭ_138] grahaṇamapi vipakṣatayā paridīpitam,
SA14kamvchtu:136_1: tathyasaṃvṛtisvabhāvaṃ tu tathāgatasya jñānahetuṃ jñānadharmakāyaṃ prāptuṃ chandaḥ praṇidhānaṃ ca pradarśite /
SA14kamvchtu:136_2: anuttarā samyaksambodhiḥ ityupalakṣaṇamātraparidīpanena śrāvaka-pratyekabuddhādīnāṃ pratipattibhedena bhinnaḥ jñānahetuko 'dhigamakāyastāvannirdiśyate /
SA14kamvchtu:137_0: saṃvṛtisvabhāvastvevam- sambodhiḥ samboddhavyaṃ deśanā deśitavyamityādayaḥ sarve paryāyāḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:137_2: taduktābhiprāyaṃ saṃgṛhya āryasubhūtisthaviraḥ yathāhaṃ bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi ityetadavocat /
SA14kamvchtu:137_4: kasmānnābhisambuddhaḥ, dharmadeśanā ca na sta iti cintāyāṃ tatkasya hetoḥ? iti /
SA14kamvchtu:137_5: agrāhyaḥ iti paramārthastāvannirvikalpajñānagocaro 'pi na bhavatīti uktapūrvam /
SA14kamvchtu:137_8: sāmānyasya cābhāvarūpatvāt / imau dvau (śabdau) abhisambuddhābhāvasya dharmadeśanābhāvasya ca yathākramaṃ hetutayābhihitau /
SA14kamvchtu:138_0: nanu syuḥ sarve bhāvā agrāhyāḥ anabhilāpyāḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:138_1: tathāpi svalakṣaṇadhāraṇāt paramārthataḥ dharmasvabhāvatāsthitā evetyāśaṅkāyāṃ na sa dharmaḥ ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:138_2: sarvabhāvānāṃ paramārthataḥ svabhāvena parinirvṛttatvānna sambhavati svalakṣaṇadhārakatvam /
SA14kamvchtu:138_3: yadyevaṃ tarhi bhagavatā abhāvo 'bhisambuddho draṣṭavya iti vicārya nādharmaḥ ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:138_4: sa tu prasajyapratiṣedhasvabhāvaḥ anena tāvat yogasamāpattiṃ nirdiśya adhyāropo 'pavādāntaśca nirastau /
SA14kamvchtu:140_0: 'yo ānanda, dharmo 'nutpannaḥ, aniruddhaḥ, asthitaḥ avikṛtastaducyate āryasatyamiti';
SA14kamvchtu:140_1: / idamānanda, abhisandhāya tathāgatena asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitā āryaśrāvakā iti deśitam,
SA14kamvchtu:141_1: anutpādād vā tathāgatānām, nityaṃ tathaiva sattvānnirvikāratvāccāsaṃskṛtaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:141_8: bhāvagrahaṇābhāvena tadabhāvarūpatve sati bhāvagrāha eva tāvat prasajyate /
SA14kamvchtu:141_9: ata eva āryasandhinirmocanasūtre uktam- 'na tattvasya bhāvāditaro 'rthaḥ';
SA14kamvchtu:142_0: ataḥ yathoktadoṣa āpadyate / tattu (tattvaṃ) paramārthato nāsti bhāvasvabhāvaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:142_3: ataḥ abhāvarūpatvena dharmeṣu sattvādatattvameva svabhāvena tat /
SA14kamvchtu:142_6: ata eva teṣu āryasandhinirmocanādiṣu- 'na tattvasya bhāvāditaro 'rthaḥ';
SA14kamvchtu:142_7: ityuktam / ata eva na dharmo nādharmaḥ ityuvāca /
SA14kamvchtu:144_0: yadi bhagavato 'bhisambodhirvā dharmadeśanā vā nāsti kaściod dharmaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:144_1: kathaṃ tarhi bodhisattvena puṇyahetudharmakāyaṃ prāptukāmena saddharmaparigrahe 'nupravartitavyamiti vicintya puṇyahetudharmakayakāmatācchandotpādanāya tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:144_5: / tato nidānam iti ratnadānānāṃ nidānāt tataḥ puṇyodbhavaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:144_7: sarvāṇi kuśalacittāni, tadutpannā vāsanāḥ puṇyāni / teṣāṃ rāśiḥ skandha iti / phalabāhulyāt tadbāhulyam / bahu iti viśeṣaṇam / bahu bahu iti dviruktyā bāhulyādhikyam /
SA14kamvchtu:145_1: kathaṃ tato nidāna puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyāt? ityāśaṅkya tatkasya hetoḥ? ityuktvā svayamabhiprāyaṃ viditvā askandhaḥ ityabhihitavān /
SA14kamvchtu:145_2: paramārthata iti śeṣaḥ / prajñaptisattvāt skandhānāṃ na puṇyaskandho bhāvarūpeṇa sambhavati /
SA14kamvchtu:145_4: bhāvānāṃ sthiratvena abhisaṃskāreṇa apravṛttatvāt cittamapi prajñaptisanmātrameva /
SA14kamvchtu:145_5: ekānekasvabhāvena pratisvaṃ parīkṣāyāṃ mithyaiva tāvat svabhāvaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:145_6: ata eva na puṇyaskandhaḥ paramārthato vidyate /
SA14kamvchtu:146_1: adhyāropāntaśca niṣiddhaḥ / vidyanta eva puṇyaskandhāḥ saṃvṛtau /
SA14kamvchtu:146_3: yadyevaṃ na syāt, paramārthataḥ sa puṇyaskandho bhavet (tadā) paramārthasya śabdāgocaratvāt na bhavet tadabhidhānam /
SA14kamvchtu:146_4: abhāṣitamityevaṃ vacanaṃ nirarthakamiti cet? yato bhāṣitāstasmāt saṃvṛtāvevetyavagantavyam /
SA14kamvchtu:147_1: tena ca bahutaraṃ puṇyamiti āvedituṃ bhagavatā yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādyuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:147_2: anena tathāgatānāṃ [Vajraṭ_142] puṇyahetukādhigamakāyasya pravacanakāyato nirjātatvāt tataścatuṣpādikāyāmapi gāthāyāṃ deśyamānāyāṃ (yadā) tādṛśaṃ puṇyāyatanaṃ bhavet (tadā) tathāgatānāṃ puṇyahetukadharmakāyasya tu kathaiva keti nirdiśyate /
SA14kamvchtu:147_4: etena paramārthataḥ dharmadeśanāyāḥ abhisambuddhasya cāpyasattve saṃvṛtau tāvat puṇyakāyadeśanāyāḥ sattvāt bodhisattvaiḥ puṇyamadhigāntuṃ pravartayitavyamevetyabhiprāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:148_2: ṣaṭpādikāyā gāthāyāḥ sattve 'pi catuṣpādikā iti viśeṣīkṛtā /
SA14kamvchtu:148_3: gāthā iti yatra na yatio, 'pāda'; śabdena catuḥpādaṃ gāthāparimāṇaṃ parigṛhyate /
SA14kamvchtu:148_5: deśayet iti padāni / samprakāśayet ityarthaḥ / asaṃkhyeyam iti saṃbahulam / aprameyam iti pramaviṣayātītatvāt /
SA14kamvchtu:149_0: kimiti śraddheyamātramuta yuktito 'vagamyamiti manasi kṛtvā tatkasya hetoḥ? iti pṛcchāyām ato nirjātā hi subhūte,
SA14kamvchtu:149_2: evaṃ [Vajraṭ_143] bahutaraṃ puṇyam iti tacca bṛhatphalatvāttat bahutaraṃ puṇyam,
SA14kamvchtu:149_4: ratnanirjātaṃ tatpuṇyaṃ tu mahāparibhogādi gauṇasāaṃsārikaṃ phalaṃ prāpayati /
SA14kamvchtu:149_6: na tu prādeśikānām / dharmadānena tāvadakṣayāpratimatathāgatapadaprāpteḥ tanmahattvaṃ kimiti na prasaktam? yathā dharmeṇānugraho na tathā ratnaiḥ pareṣāmanugrahaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:149_7: tathā hi parebhyaḥ samprakāśitena kramaśo 'nena dharmeṇa kṣiprameva buddhatvapadaṃ labhyate,
SA14kamvchtu:149_8: na tu ratnaiḥ / ata eva parebhyaḥ parānugrāhakatvād ratnadānād dharmadānaṃ viśiṣṭamityābhisandhiḥ /

SA14kamvchtu:160_1: tathā hi-phalabhūtaṃ prāpyasvabhāvaṃ kiñcit syāt (tarhi) saṃskṛtamasaṃskṛtaṃ vā syāt /

SA14kamvchtu:163_4: evaṃ yataḥ paramārthataḥ sa kañcit (dharmaṃ) nāpannaḥ,

SA14kamvchtu:167_7: ahamasmi bhagavan arhan vītarāgaḥ iti nātmābhiniveśena,
SA14kamvchtu:169_0: nanvasati kasmiṃścidapi prāpye prāpake vā paramārthataḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:169_1: bodhisattvabhūtena bhagavatā kathaṃ tathāgatadīpaṅkarasyāntikād dharma udgṛhītaḥ? atha nodgṛhīta iti ced? tadāsmābhirdharmamudgrahītukāmaiḥ kathamārādhanīstathāgatotpāda iti ye parikalpayanti teṣāmalpaśrutatvapratibandhāpākaraṇārtha ṣaṣṭhaṃ sthānamadhikṛtyāha- asti sa kaścid dharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṅkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksambuddhasyāntikādudgṛhītaḥ? iti /
SA14kamvchtu:169_2: subhūtirapi prāgevābhiprāyaṃ viditvā no hīdam ityavocat /

SA14kamvchtu:170_0: anenārthataḥ 'bodhisattvena śrutaparyeṣaṇakāle buddhotpāda ārādhanīyastadanantaraṃ buddhadharmā udgṛhītavyāḥ';
SA14kamvchtu:170_3: asti sa kaścid dharmo dīpaṅkarasyāntikādudgṛhītaḥ? iti diṅmātrābhidhānena udgṛhītadharmasya sarvanimittaṃ vinivartate /
SA14kamvchtu:170_5: ityanena paramārthataḥ dharmāṇāmagrāhyatvaṃ vyavasthāpya tatra yogasamāpattiḥ vikṣepanigrahaśca nirdiṣṭau /
SA14kamvchtu:172_0: yadi paramārthataḥ karmakartrādayo na syustadā kathaṃ bodhisattvā buddhakṣetrapariśodhanārthaṃ praṇidadhatīti tarkayatāṃ teṣāṃ hīnālambanamanasikārabhāvanāvibandhasaṃyogārthaṃ saptamasthānamadhikṛtyāha- yaḥ kaścid bodhisattvaḥ iti /
SA14kamvchtu:172_1: vitatham iti mṛṣā / yadyevaṃ (tarhi) bhagavān bodhisattvānāṃ tattatkṣetrapariśuddhisampadaṃ kathamuktavāniti vicintya tatkasya hetoḥ? iti pṛcchāyaṃ kṣetravyūhāḥ ityādi samādhānamabhihitam /

SA14kamvchtu:173_3: avyūhāste tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ ityanena paramārthavyavasthāpanena yogasamāpattau pravṛttiḥ gambhīratā ca nirdiśyete /
