SA14kamvchtu:187_5: sā cārthataḥ sarvavidhaprajñāsu uttamā tāthāgatī prajñā nānyadā prajñayā pāraṃ parimāpayituṃ śakyam /
SA14kamvchtu:187_7: sā ca yathoktā prajñaiva, na tvanyat tatpāragamanāsambhavāt /
SA14kamvchtu:187_11: tasyāśca bhagavatāḥ pratyātmavedyatvenāsādhāraṇatvāt paramārthataścānutpannatvāt sā śabdenābhidhātuṃ na śakyata ityāśayena vitarkya tatkasya hetoḥ? itio pṛṣṭavān /
SA14kamvchtu:187_12: yaiva subhūte, prajñāpāramitā tathāgatena bhāṣitā sā ityudatarat /
SA14kamvchtu:188_0: paramārthataḥ pratyātmavedyatvenāsādhāraṇatvāt paramārthataśca sarvadharmāṇām atyantānutpannatvāt ca sā na śabdenābhidheyā,
SA14kamvchtu:188_4: tasmāt vikalpapratibimbabhūtā yā prajñāpāramitā tathāgatena deśitā,
SA14kamvchtu:188_6: na tu tathāgatasya prajñā, satyasaṃvṛtyā jñeyasya pāraṅgatatvāttasyāḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:188_8: tato bhrāntapratīteḥ sa vikalpapratibimbo naiva bhedenāvagamyate,
SA14kamvchtu:188_9: ato jñānasvabhāvatvena saiva paramārthaprajñā tathāgatena bhāṣitā ityucyate /
SA14kamvchtu:188_11: athavā yā tāthāgatī prajñā pratītirūpatvena tathāgatena bhāṣitā saiva paramārthato na vidyate,
SA14kamvchtu:188_13: eva iti śabdastu apāramitā ityetadanantaraṃ draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:189_0: anena paramārthatvaṃ pratipādya tatra yogasamāpattyā kathaṃ pratipattavyamiti nirdiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:189_1: yathā prajñāpāramitā vikalpapratibimbātmikaiva bāhyatvena samāropya bhagavatā bhāṣitā,
SA14kamvchtu:189_2: tathaiva sarve dharmā api nānyathā tathāgatena kathitā iti deśanārthamāha- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte iti /
SA14kamvchtu:189_7: ata eva ca paramārthataḥ 'nāsti kaścid dharmo yastathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ';
SA14kamvchtu:189_8: iti vijñāya sthaviraḥ subhūtiḥ no hīdaṃ bhagavan,
SA14kamvchtu:189_9: nāsti sa kaścid dharmo yastathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ ityavocat /
SA14kamvchtu:189_10: anena vikṣepanigrahaḥ gāmbhīryaṃ ca nirdiṣṭe bhavataḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:191_1: tathāpi ye tāvad ādikarmikāḥ kathaṃ sarvadharmeṣu nairātmyaṃ bhāvayitavyamiti cintayanti,
SA14kamvchtu:191_3: atra dvividhena upāyena ekānekasvabhāvaviyogādhigamāt sarvadharmanairātmyaṃ bhāvayitavyamiti darśyate /
SA14kamvchtu:191_5: tatra yāvat pṛthivīrajo bhavet ityanena ekasvabhāvaviyogādhigamāt tanūkaraṇopāyo nirdiśyate /
SA14kamvchtu:191_9: ata eva paramāṇuvibhāvanāyāṃ sattyāmekatvaṃ prahīyata eveti /
SA14kamvchtu:192_0: te ca paramāṇavo 'pi yadi digbhāgabhedena bhinnatvādasiddhā eva syuḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:192_1: (tarhiṃ) kathaṃ tad bahu rajaḥ? iti pravādināmāśayamabhilakṣya kasya [Vajraṭ_161] hetoḥ? ityapṛcchat /
SA14kamvchtu:192_3: bahu tat pṛthivīrajo 'pi yaḥ paramāṇusvabhāva uktastadekatvagrahaṇaniṣedhāt tadaraja eva /
SA14kamvchtu:192_6: na tu paramārtham, tenocyate pṛthivīraja iti / tad yuktaṃ saṃvṛtau sattvāt, anyathā paramārthastasyāsattvād anabhilāpyatvācca svalakṣaṇaṃ nābhilapyata ityevamabhiprāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:192_10: evañcāntaśaḥ paramāṇūnāmapi yuktyā pratyekaṃ parikṣyamāṇānāṃ pratītāveva sattvāt pratīyate lokadhātūnāṃ cānekasvaviyuktatvam,
SA14kamvchtu:193_0: evaṃ khalu bhājanalokasya ekānekasvabhāvaviyogena niḥsvabhāvatvamṝ evamabhidhāya sattvalokasyāpyabhidhānārtha yo 'sau lokadhātuḥ ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:193_2: itarasya pūrvamevoktatvāt / adhātuḥ saḥ iti ekānekasvabhāvarahitaḥ sa ityabhiprāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:193_3: evaṃ yo hi rūpaskandhaḥ sa bhājanalokatvenābhihitaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:193_4: śeṣāścatvāraḥ skandhāstu yathaikānekasvabhāvena viyuktāstathā pūrvaṃ vivecitā eva /
SA14kamvchtu:193_5: evaṃ sati paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatvāt sarve dharmā māyopamā dṛśyante yogibhiḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:194_2: tatprahāṇārthaṃ ca chandaḥ praṇidhānaṃ ca nirdiṣṭe /
SA14kamvchtu:194_3: trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau iti nimittamātrābhidhānena sarvabhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvabhāvanā sandarśitā /
SA14kamvchtu:194_4: arajastat iti adhātuḥ ityābhyāṃ paramārthavyavasthāpanayā yogasamāpattyā kathaṃ pratipattavyamiti tat paridīpitam /
SA14kamvchtu:194_5: tenocyate lokadhātuḥ ityanenāpavādāntaṃ parihṛtya vikṣepanigraho nirdiṣṭaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:196_0: samprati ye bodhisattvāḥ puṇyasambhārapratipattaye 'tyantamupakāritvād bhagavantaṃ pūjayeyusteṣāṃ tasya (bhagavataḥ) avināśikāyo na pūrayati puṇyasambhāram,
SA14kamvchtu:196_2: tasmāt teṣāṃ sambhārāsañcayato viyogārthaṃ ekādaśasthānamadhikṛtyāha- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādi /
SA14kamvchtu:197_4: atrārthataḥ rūpakāye tathāgatābhiniveśaṃ vipakṣatvena nirdiśya tatprahānārthaṃ chandaḥ praṇidhānaṃ cāpi pradarśite /
SA14kamvchtu:199_0: evaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ nairātmyāvagamopāye nirdiṣṭe 'pi kāyajīviteṣvāsajya ye lābhasatkārādhyasitāḥ kausīdyalābhasatkārapiṇḍapātānuraktā teṣāṃ tatrānuraktivisaṃyogārthaṃ dvādaśasthānamadhikṛtyāha- yaśca khalu punaḥ sūbhūte,
SA14kamvchtu:200_1: anena cāsāre 'nekaśatasahasraduḥkhaikasthānatucchātmabhāve tasmin snihyan etāvacchariraparityāgenāpi yatpuṇyaṃ na prāptam,
SA14kamvchtu:200_2: tadantarāyakaratvāttasmin kāyajīvite nirapekṣacittatayā sarvātmanāsmin (dharmaparyāye) yogaḥ karaṇīya iti paridipitam /
SA14kamvchtu:200_4: tatprahāṇāya saddharmasamādānāya ca chandaḥ praṇidhānañcāpi nirdiṣṭe /
SA14kamvchtu:201_1: āryasubhūtiḥ aśrūṇi prāmuñcat tadapi bhagavato 'dhiṣṭhānenānyeṣu kusīdeṣu janeṣu adbhutamahāyānadharmasyābhidhānena paramaśraddhotpādārthe draṣṭavyam /
SA14kamvchtu:201_2: tasmād hastena aśrūṇi pramṛjya bhagavantametadavocat āścaryaṃ bhagavan,
SA14kamvchtu:201_4: yāvad iti kāritraviśeṣaḥ / yāvatā prakāreṇa deśānārhāstān bodhisattvānupadiśantviti vākyārthaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:202_1: yataḥ ityāryasatyagocarajñānotpādamārabhya etatparyantaṃ dharmaparyāyasya paramapuṇyaphalasya yathoktā deśanā śrāvaka-pratyekabuddhanāmagocarā naivaṃ śrutapūrvetyarthaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:202_3: evaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ puṇyaṃ śrutvā yeṣāṃ vīryamārabhya pravṛttānāmasmin dharme yathārutasaṃjñā bhavati teṣāṃ taddoṣaparijihīrṣayā parameṇāścaryeṇa ityavocat /
SA14kamvchtu:203_0: nanu bhūtasaṃjñāyāṃ satyāṃ, saṃjñāyā api sattvaṃ paramārthataḥ syāt,
SA14kamvchtu:203_1: asatsu ca saṃjñeyeṣu saṃjñāyā apyabhāvaḥ prasajyeta,
SA14kamvchtu:203_2: tasmāt kathaṃ paramārthataḥ sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatvaṃ sidhyedityupālambhaṃ vicintya tatkasya hetoḥ? ityavocat /
SA14kamvchtu:203_3: yā caiṣā bhagavan, bhūtasaṃjñā ityuadatarat / saṃjñānāma na kācana, ekānekasvabhāvena viyogāt, paramārthataḥ sā asaṃjñaiva /
SA14kamvchtu:203_4: ata eva nocyate bhūtasaṃjñeyaṃ bhūtasaṃjñātveneti darśitam,
SA14kamvchtu:203_5: yato hyavicāraramaṇīyamātrataḥ vidyate tasmāt tāṃ tathāgato bhāṣate bhūtasaṃjñā,
SA14kamvchtu:203_8: kathaṃ ca vikṣepo nigrahītavya ityubhayaṃ darśitaṃ gāmbhīryañcāpi nigaditam,
SA14kamvchtu:204_2: adhimucye, ye 'pi te bhagavan, sattvā bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani paścime kāle paścime [Vajraṭ_165] samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ ye imaṃ bhagavan,
SA14kamvchtu:204_4: dhārayiṣyanti, paryavāpsyanti, te paramāścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:205_0: atrāyaṃ sāmānyena samāsārthaḥ- anāgate saddharmavipralopakāle ye bodhisattvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
SA14kamvchtu:205_2: mayyapyevaṃ sambhāvanāyāṃ saddharmotthānakāle 'pi yuṣmākametādṛśapratipattyabhāve idamatyantaṃ lajjāsthānaṃ tat syādityucyate /
SA14kamvchtu:205_5: bhāṣyamāṇam iti tu sākṣāt prākāśyamānaṃ bhagavatā,
SA14kamvchtu:205_9: anāgate kalpe bhāvinaḥ / atrodgrahīṣyantītyādīni yāni padāni tāni pūrvamevoktāni /
SA14kamvchtu:206_0: taccaivaṃ nirucyate- pudgalanairātmyamātramavaganturmama bhagavataḥ sakāśāt sākṣāt śravaṇabalena yaddhi nairātmyadvayapratipādake 'smin dharme prasādasampratyayamātraṃ jātaṃ tannaivāścaryam /
SA14kamvchtu:206_1: ye bhagavan (teṣu) kalpeṣu asmin [dharme] dhāraṇādikrameṇa īdṛśaṃ dharmaparyāyamadhigamya paryavāpsyanti te paramāścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti /
SA14kamvchtu:207_0: etena kausīdyaṃ prahāya saddharmagrahaṇādau chandena praṇidhānena ca sthātavyamityādarśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:207_1: na kevalaṃ teṣu āgamayoga evāpitu (teṣu) pratipattisampadamapi darśayitum api tu khalu punarbhagavan ityavocat /
SA14kamvchtu:207_2: ātmā ityādivacanam, tūpalakṣaṇam, atasteṣāṃ dharmasaṃjñā (api) na pravartiṣyate,
SA14kamvchtu:208_0: yadyanātmādikaṃ sat tadā saṃjñāpi tatra niyamena pravartayediti vicintya tatkasya hetoḥ? iti pṛṣṭvā ātmasaṃjñā ityudatārīt /
SA14kamvchtu:208_2: tasyā api parikṣākṣamatvādakiñcanatve sati ātmādyanubhavābhāvādasatyāḥ kā kathā /
SA14kamvchtu:209_0: nanu cāsattve satyātmādestadviparyayeṇa nātmasaṃjñā pravartiṣyata iti kuta ityābhyantarotthitaṃ praśnaṃ vicārya tatkasya hetoḥ? ityavocat /
SA14kamvchtu:209_7: tasmāt buddhairbhagavadbhiryathā sarvasaṃjñāpagatatvaṃ śikṣitaṃ tathā bodhisattvairapi śikṣitavyam /
SA14kamvchtu:209_8: tasmād ye bodhisattvāstasyāmanuśikṣante teṣāmātmādisaṃjñā niyamato na pravartate /
SA14kamvchtu:209_9: [Vajraṭ_167] evametat iti vineyānāṃ niścayāpādanārthaṃ svayamabhyupagamya bhagavatā dviruktam /
SA14kamvchtu:209_12: ataḥ prathamataramanārabdhavīryāṇāṃ teṣām anārabdhavīryatvāpanayanārthaṃ ye sattvāḥ ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:209_15: mahāyāne tu tadapi dharmamātraṃ mithyeti deśitam,
SA14kamvchtu:209_16: tasmād anādikālīnasahajātmadṛṣṭisamprayuktāntaḥkaraṇā abhāvitātmānaḥ pudgalanairātmyaṃ śrutvā nāstyahamiti trasiṣyanti /
SA14kamvchtu:209_19: yad dharmamātraṃ tasyāpyasattve 'aho ! na mayā bhāvyam';
SA14kamvchtu:209_20: iti matvā daśadigavalokanenāpi śaraṇābhāvāt santrāse tadapākaraṇāya na santrasiṣyanti ityuddiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:210_0: anye tāvannairātmyadvayānavabodhād yo hi trāso mṛdu-madhyādhimātrātmakaḥ sa ebhistribhiḥ padaiḥ yathākramamudīrita ityevaṃ manyante,
SA14kamvchtu:210_2: samprati lābhasatkāreṣu vītarāgatvāt 'te paramāścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyantīti /
SA14kamvchtu:210_3: '; śrotukāmānāṃ hitāya svayaṃ pūrvaṃ praśnamuthyāpya tatkasya hetoḥ? ityavocat /
SA14kamvchtu:210_6: na kevalaṃ mayaiveyaṃ paramā paramā proktā,
SA14kamvchtu:210_7: [Vajraṭ_168] api tu sarvabuddhairapīyaṃ parametyukteti darśanārthaṃ yāṃ ca paramapāramitāṃ iti nigaditam /
SA14kamvchtu:211_0: anena 'ekabuiddhena deśitamapi aviparītārthatvena gṛhyate sarvabuddhaikābhipretatve khalu kimucyatām';
SA14kamvchtu:211_1: ityevaṃ dīpitam / (yadi) asmābhiḥ sarvaiḥ paramā saṃsādhitā syāt,
SA14kamvchtu:211_2: kathaṃ na (vayaṃ) parameṇāścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyāmaḥ? anena paramatvadarśanena hriyaḥ dvitīyaṃ sthānaṃ nirdiśyate,
SA14kamvchtu:211_3: tathā hi- dharmo 'yaṃ (etāvān) śreṣṭhastathāpi tvaṃ yallābhasatkārādhyavasitaḥ pramādena sthitastadatīva lajjājanakamityucyate /
SA14kamvchtu:213_0: evaṃ hrīsthāne deśite 'pi ye duḥkhe 'kṣāntyā vīryātiśayamārabdhuṃ notsahante,
SA14kamvchtu:213_1: teṣāṃ duḥkhākṣāntervyapagamārthaṃ trayodaśasthānamadhikṛtyāha apia tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādi /
SA14kamvchtu:213_2: kimatra kṣāntiḥ? kena lakṣaṇena sā kṣāntirjñāyate? tasyāḥ ya ākāraḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:213_3: yathā vākāraḥ, yaścākṣānteḥ pratipakṣaḥ so 'nena sthānena darśyate /
SA14kamvchtu:213_5: ataḥ yā tathāgatasya kṣāntipāramitā saiva apāramitā ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:213_6: paramārthataḥ kā kṣāntiḥ, yena kṣāntiḥ, yatra kṣāntiḥ, yaśca kṣamyaḥ, yā ca kṣāntiḥ, teṣāṃ sarveṣāmanupalambhāt [Vajraṭ_169] saiva apāramitā /
SA14kamvchtu:213_7: evaṃ paramārthato 'nutpannatvāt nāsti tatra pāraṃ gatetyabhisandhiḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:213_8: anena tasyāḥ kṣānteḥ svabhāvenānutpannatvaṃ gāmbhīryaṃ cāpi darśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:214_0: evaṃ sarvadharmānupalambhamanasikāreṇa kutaḥ bodhisattvānāṃ kṣāntiriti vicintya tatkasya hetoḥ? iti jñāpakahetau pṛṣṭe yadā subhūte ityādyattaramāha /
SA14kamvchtu:214_1: aṅgāni hastapādādīni, pratyaṅgāni aṅgulyādīni / nāpi me kācitsaṃjñā iti paradehasaṃjñā,
SA14kamvchtu:214_2: śastrasaṃjñā, chedasaṃjñā, parasaṃjñā, kṣāntisaṃjñādayaśca / anena sarvadharmānupalambho 'bhihitaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:215_0: nanu asatyāñca kasyāñcit saṃjñāyāṃ mūrcchāvasthāvad cittābhāvo bhaviṣyatīti cet? tatra nāpi asaṃjñā vā babhūva ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:215_2: tacca kathamiti cittagataṃ praśnaṃ vikalpya svayaṃ tatkasya hetoḥ? ityuktvā sacet sūbhūte ityudatarat /
SA14kamvchtu:215_8: ata evātmānurūpā pravṛtiḥ / tatrātmani ātmīyeṣu ca pravṛttau anurāgaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:215_9: tadviparīteṣu ca dveṣaḥ / tābhyāṃ sambaddhaḥ samasto doṣarāśiḥ sambhavati /
SA14kamvchtu:216_1: anayoḥ sampratibaddhāḥ sarve doṣāḥ prajāyante // iti //
SA14kamvchtu:217_1: yena kṣāntibalena kaliṅgarājā eva sattvaḥ narakaṃ gamiṣyatītyabhipretam /
SA14kamvchtu:217_2: anena kṛtāpakāre 'pi [Vajraṭ_170] sati nirvikāratayā niyataṃ vyāpādādisambhavābhāvatayā ātmādisaṃjñāvyapagamahetutayā ca īdṛśyāḥ kṣānterjñānamādarśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:218_2: aṅga-pratyaṅga ityanena duḥkhādhivāsanakṣāntiḥ me tasmin samaye ityādinā ca dharmanidhyānakṣāntiḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:218_3: anena dharmapudgalavikalpayorvipakṣatayā nirdeśena vineyāstatprahāṇe yathoktakṣāntyutpāde samyaggrahaṇe cāvataranti /
SA14kamvchtu:218_4: tadevam, vineyajanāḥ 'yadā bhagavāneva bodhyarthamevaṃvidhāṃ parāṃ kṣāntiṃ bhāvitavān,
SA14kamvchtu:219_0: samprati yadākārā sā kṣāntiḥ, tathā darśayitum- abhijānāmyahaṃ subhūte ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:219_2: sākṣānnoktam / sā ca kṣāntiḥ dvividhā dīpitānirantaraparāpakāraduḥkhaviṣayikā parāpakārāsahyaduḥkhaviṣayikā ca /
SA14kamvchtu:220_3: samastenānena asahyaprahāṇāt bodhau chandena [Vajraṭ_171] praṇidhānena ca sthātavyamiti darśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:220_4: bodhicittotpāde sati na kenāpi saṃsāraduḥkhena spṛṣṭo bhaviṣyatītyabhiprāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:220_5: bodhicittotpāde 'pi ātmābhiniviṣṭatayā trividhaduḥkhasaṃjñābhiḥ santrasya kadācit punarnotpādaḥ syādataḥ sarvasaṃjñā vivarjayitvā ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:220_7: rūpādyabhiniveśena śrāvakādivat saṃsāraṃ parikalpya tadduḥkhasantaptāḥ na kadācidapi bodhicittamutpādayanti,
SA14kamvchtu:221_0: rūpādiṣu satābhiniveśo hi tatra pratiṣṭhita iti pūrvavadatrāpyuktaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:221_5: na kvacit pratiṣṭhitam ityanena rūpādiṣu nāmamātrasattābhiniveśaḥ pratiṣidhyate,
SA14kamvchtu:222_1: yaduta asatāṃ vitathābhiniveśasya prahāṇārthaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate? iti cittotthitaṃ praśnaṃ vitarkya tatkasya hetoḥ? ityapṛcchat /
SA14kamvchtu:222_3: atrāyamarthaḥ- anādikālastaccitaṃ rūpādiṣu bhāvābhiniveśabalena rūpādau pratiṣṭhitam,
SA14kamvchtu:222_4: yaḥ khalu satyābhiniveśaḥ, sa tasya rūpādivastuno 'bhāvāt paramārthato na pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:222_5: tasmādeva ityanenopasaṃhāreṇātra dvitīye pakṣe pratisṭhitatvameva darśitaṃ bhavati /
SA14kamvchtu:223_0: dvitīyāsahyavastuna pratipakṣatvena api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:223_2: te 'pi sattvā yadi paramārthato na syuḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:223_4: kathaṃ te tathāvidheṣu mithyāpravṛtteṣu sattveṣu khinnā bhaveyuḥ [Vajraṭ_172] ityādarśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:223_5: tatra sattvaṃ saṃjñāṃ ca pratiṣidhya nairātmyadvayamudīritam /
SA14kamvchtu:224_0: evaṃ tāvad yuktyā kṣāntiryujyata iti nirdiśya sāmprataṃ tathāgate sampratyayo 'pi yujyata iti nirūpayan bhūtavādī ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:224_1: prathamam uddeśaḥ, śeṣaḥ vidheyam / athavā satyacatuṣṭayamuddeśaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:224_2: kramaśaḥ abhisambadhyate / athavā bhūtavādī iti sādhyam,
SA14kamvchtu:224_4: yathānye buddhā bhagavantaḥ kleśajñeyāvaraṇāni prahīṇavantastathaiva tathāgato 'pyayaṃ gataḥ prāptaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:225_0: tathāgata evāyamiti kathaṃ sidhyatītyāha- satyavādī iti /
SA14kamvchtu:225_1: 'satyam'; caturāryasatyalakṣaṇam, tasya yo vādī, sa tathāgata iti nirdhāryate /
SA14kamvchtu:225_2: atyantaparokṣārthastu sarvathā samyak kathayituṃ na śakyate,
SA14kamvchtu:227_1: ayaṃ satyavādī satyaṃ kena rūpeṇa jānātityāha- tathāvādī iti /
SA14kamvchtu:227_3: sa heyopādeyatattvaṃ sopāyaṃ yathāsthitaṃ tathaiva bhāṣate 'taḥ sa kathaṃ na satyavādī syāditi /
SA14kamvchtu:227_4: evaṃbhūte 'pi taddeśitāni catvāri satyāni kiṃ tathaiva pratiṣṭhitānīti? ityata āha- na vitathavādī iti /
SA14kamvchtu:227_6: na pramāṇabādhitāni uktānyataḥ satyānītyarthaḥ etena samagreṇa kāryakāraṇena bhagavataḥ prāmāṇyaṃ sādhitam /
SA14kamvchtu:229_0: ekasyāpi bhāvasvabhāvasya paramārthato 'siddhatvād ekamapi satyaṃ tāvad duḥsādhyam,
SA14kamvchtu:230_4: nirodhasya tvabhāvāt tatprāpako mārgo 'pi naiva paramārthataḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:230_6: tathoktam- 'bodhiṃ pratiṣṭhāya ekasyāpi satyasya siddhirna dṛṣṭā,
SA14kamvchtu:231_0: etat pravicintya ye bhūtavādini śabdaśo 'bhiniviṣṭāsteṣāmadhyāropāntaparihārārtham api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:231_1: na tatra satyam iti paramārthataḥ kasyacidapi svabhāvasyāsiddheḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:231_2: na mṛṣā ityatra satyavyavacchedena [Vajraṭ_174] sthitatvāt tadvyavacchedyatvābhāvād yena mṛṣāatvaṃ bhavet tanmṛṣā /
SA14kamvchtu:231_3: atha vā na satyam iti yathā māyopamā mṛṣā jñānarūpāḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:231_5: anena tāvad antadvayapratiṣedhena madhyamā pratipad eva nirdiśyate /
SA14kamvchtu:232_1: anupalabhya atadarthako vā, tayoḥ ko viśeṣa iti yaccintanaṃ tat tṛtīyasyāsahyavastunaḥ pratipakṣatvenāha tadyathāpi nāma ityādi /
SA14kamvchtu:232_2: yaḥ kāya-bhava-bhogātmakavastuṣu sukhamātratvenābhiniviśya (satyatvenaivābhiniviśya) tadarthikastatra patitvā dānaṃ dadāti,
SA14kamvchtu:232_4: satorapi cakṣuṣoḥ vastvarthānupalambhena heyopādeyārthānabhijñatayā viparyastārtheṣu samastaduḥkhasthāneṣu patito bhavati /
SA14kamvchtu:233_1: kāyādivastvanupalabhya tadanarthī bhūtvā dānaṃ dadāti tattu yathāpi nāma cakṣuṣmān puruṣaḥ nānāvidhāni rūpāṇi paśyet dṛṣṭvā ca heyasya hānam upādeyasya copādānamiva /
SA14kamvchtu:233_2: (atha) tadapi asatyaruṇodaye kadācinna dṛśyata iti? sūrye 'bhyudgate ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:233_3: sūrye 'bhyudgate 'pi andhakārapūrṇeṣu gṛhādiṣu na paśyatīti matvāha prabhātāyām iti /
SA14kamvchtu:234_0: tatsāmagrye 'pi yo 'ndhaḥ, sa kadācidapi na paśyatītyāśaṅkāyāṃ cakṣuṣmān ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:234_2: saḥ avidyātāmisraprabodhena jñānasūryābhyudgamena ca nānāvidhāni jñeyāni yathāvat sampaśyati,
SA14kamvchtu:234_3: viparyastavastūni samastaduḥkhasthānāni heyaduḥkhāni cāpi mṛṣātvāt parivarjayati,
SA14kamvchtu:235_0: tasmād bodhisattvā mahābhogasampadanuprāpya anuttarasukhena kāyaṃ sthirīkṛtya bodheravinivṛttā bhavantītyabhiprāyaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:235_1: ata eva avinivṛtā iti / pūrvaṃ tvālambanamātreṇa tasmin sthitirādarśitā,
SA14kamvchtu:235_3: tasmādatra patita ityuktam, pūrvaṃ tu pratiṣṭhita ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:237_0: anena prakāreṇa kṣāntipravṛtā api ye dhyānasamāsvādayantastatraivāsaktā jñānasambhārapāripūraye hetubhūtaṃ mahāyānadharmamanārabdhāsteṣāṃ jñānasambhāraviyogaparihārārthaṃ caturdaśasthānamadhikṛtya api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:237_1: sthānenānena dhyānarasāsvādāpagamāya pañcabhiḥ prakāraiḥ saddharmaṃ prati vīryārthaṃ guṇaviśeṣaḥ paridīpitaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:238_1: tatra tathāgatānubhāvastu jñātāste tathāgatena ityādi yadāha /
SA14kamvchtu:238_3: bhagavān hi sarvaṃ vijānātīti sarvajñaḥ draṣṭā ca /
SA14kamvchtu:238_4: tatra kiṃ mahad āścaryaṃ teṣvityanveṣaṇāyāṃ puṇyasañcayavaiśiṣṭyamādarśayitumāha sarve te sattvāḥ iti /
SA14kamvchtu:238_5: aprameyapuṇyaskandhānāṃ prasavanād jñātāste bhāgyavanta iti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:239_1: yena (saḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ) aparimito bhavatīti vicintya viśiṣṭapuṇyasaṃgrahaṃ darśayan paśca khalu punaḥ subhūte ! strī vā puruṣo vā ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:240_2: na tu viśiṣṭatvena parikalpita iveti darśayituṃ kālaśabdastatsāmānyādhikaraṇyena viśeṣyate /
SA14kamvchtu:240_3: anyathaikātmyād ayaṃ pūrvāhṇa ityādibhedā na syuḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:240_4: viśeṣaṇāntarairbhede 'bhyupagate sa eva viśeṣaḥ sūryādyavasthānāṃ viśeṣaḥ pūrvāhṇādivyavahāraprajñaptīnāṃ ca hetuḥ syāt,
SA14kamvchtu:240_8: etacca pūrvaṃ darśitameva / bādhakapramāṇasyāpi prāgevātmadūṣaṇaprasaṅge darśitatvāt kimadhikena /
SA14kamvchtu:241_1: sāmānyajanaiḥ saṅketavaśenotpannastathāvidhaḥ praṇināmavasthāviśeṣaḥ kālaḥ iti vyavahāre prajñapyate,
SA14kamvchtu:241_2: na tu śabdārthasambandhaprajñaptivaśeneti darśayituṃ samaye iti śabdena viśeṣyate /
SA14kamvchtu:241_6: pūrvaṃ deyasya evaṃvidhasya ca kālasyānirdeśānnaiva tāvat punaruktidoṣaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:242_0: ayameva tato nidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyād aprameyamasaṃkhyeyam ityanena audāryaṃ paridīpyate /
SA14kamvchtu:242_2: evaṃ tāvat gaṅgānadībālukāsamāna iti saṃkhyāviśeṣaṃ darśayati /
SA14kamvchtu:242_5: sā ca kalpakoṭiḥ niyutā, sāpi śatasahasreti padena yuktā /
SA14kamvchtu:243_0: etat kathaṃ jñātavyam? iti dharmastutivaiśiṣṭyaṃ darśayitum api tu khalu subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:243_1: acintyo 'yaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ atyantagambhīraḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ nisvabhāvatālakṣaṇaḥ tathāgataiḥ pratyātmavedanīyaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:243_5: tulyasya adhikasya vābhāvena acintyahetuto 'cintyameva phalaṃ sambhavatītyuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:243_6: kathaṃ atulya iti cintāyāmāha śreṣṭhayānasamprasthitānām iti /
SA14kamvchtu:243_9: agrayānam ityagrāṇāṃ yānaṃ vā agraṃ cedaṃ yānamiti vā padavigrahaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:244_1: samastakleśajñeyāvaraṇaviśuddhayā vā śreṣṭha athavā agramiti paramam /
SA14kamvchtu:244_2: pratyekabuddhayānamapi śrāvakayānāpekṣayā paramiti vicāraṇāyāmāha- śreṣṭhayānasamprasthitānām iti /
SA14kamvchtu:244_4: śrāvakādyenekayānebhyo 'tiśayena praśasyatvādatra śreṣṭhaḥ iti śabda prayuktaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:244_5: tacca mahāyānamityeva / śrāvakādināmabhavyatvād dharmadeśaneyaṃ bodhisattvebhya evoktā /
SA14kamvchtu:244_8: dharmaparyāyo 'yam ityādibhiḥ yathoktārthān prasādhya upasaṃhṛtya ca tatpratipattuṃ viśeṣastutiḥ sandarśitā /
SA14kamvchtu:245_0: yato hi dharmaparyāyo 'yamacintyo 'prameyaśca tasmād vipāko 'pyasyācintya eva /
SA14kamvchtu:245_1: tataḥ ye imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti ityādi tu siddhamevetyarthaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:245_2: aprameyam ityuddeśaḥ, śeṣastānnirdeśaḥ / tatra acintyam iti cintāviṣayātikrāntatvena ananumeyatvāt /
SA14kamvchtu:245_3: atulyam ityapratisamam / amāpyam iti sarvasattvaprayoge 'pi māpayitumaśakyatvāt /
SA14kamvchtu:245_6: sarve te subhūte, sattvāḥ samāṃśena bodhiṃ dhārayiṣyanti iti bodhibhārodvahanam aṃśodvahanasadṛśam /
SA14kamvchtu:245_7: anena tāvat sakalena dhyānasukhāsvādaṃ parityajya jñānasambhārapāripūrihetau dharmaparigrahaṇādau chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti darśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:246_0: kasmāt khalu śreṣṭhayānasamprasthitebhyo bhagavatā bhāṣito na tvanyebhyaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:246_1: kiṃ khalu bhagavatyapi rāgo dveṣaśca iti vicintya tatkasya hetoḥ? ityāha,
SA14kamvchtu:246_3: anena khalu bhagavati sarvasattveṣu ekasutavad vātsalyamiti nāsti rāgo dveṣo vā /
SA14kamvchtu:246_4: tathāpi ye yadā bhavyā bhavanti tadā tebhyo deśayanti,
SA14kamvchtu:246_5: na tvanyebhyaḥ / anyathā upāyānabhijñatvānnaiva bhaved bhagavān sarvajñaḥ ityevaṃ darśyate /
SA14kamvchtu:246_8: nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate iti nāsti tadarthamavakāśa iti /
SA14kamvchtu:247_0: yacchrāvakaiḥ pratyekabuddhaiścāpi śrotuṃ na śakyate tatkathaṃ śakyate pṛthagjanaiḥ śrotum? yattairna śrotuṃ śakyaṃ tat kathaṃ śakyata udgrahītuṃ vā paryavāptuṃ vā /
SA14kamvchtu:248_0: yadyevaṃ kathaṃ tāvadāryasubhūtinā dharmaparyāyo 'yaṃ śrotuṃ śakyata iti ced? bhagavato 'dhiṣṭhāneneti nāsti doṣaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:248_1: sarvapradeśeṣu yasmin pṛthivīpradeśe sūtramidaṃ bhāṣyate sa evaikaḥ pṛthivīpradeśo 'nuśaṃsanīya iti pratipādayan devadisatkāravaiśiṣṭyaṃ darśayitum api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādyavocat /
SA14kamvchtu:250_0: nanu īdṛśeṣu dharmaparyāyeṣu abhyudyatānāmapi kathaṃ kecit paribhūtā dṛśyanta iti cintāyāṃ pāpapariśodhanaviśeṣadeśanāya ye subhūte,
SA14kamvchtu:250_3: suparibhūtāśca bhaviṣyanti iti vadhabandhanādibhiḥ pīḍitā bhaviṣyanti /
SA14kamvchtu:251_0: evamete mahātmānaḥ kathaṃ paribhūtā bhaviṣyantīti vicintyāha tatkasya hetoḥ? iti /
SA14kamvchtu:251_4: buddhabodhiṃ [Vajraṭ_181] cānuprāpsyanti iti pāpāni pariśodhya kālāntare bhāvanāniratā na ciraṃ anuttarasamyaksabodhimabhisambuddhya buddhā bhaviṣyantīti vākyārthaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:252_0: tato nidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyādaprameyamasaṃkhyeyam iti yadāha tatra kena prakāreṇa aprameyākhyeyāvabodhaḥ syāt? ityatra abhijānāmyahaṃ subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:252_1: atra prabhāveṇa bahutareṇa cāprameyamasaṃkhyeyaṃ ca paridīpitam /
SA14kamvchtu:252_2: tatrābhijānāmi subhūte atīte 'dhvanyasaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpaiḥ asaṃkhyeyataraiḥ ityādinā prabhāvaḥ paridīpataḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:253_2: anayoḥ (puṇyaskandhayoḥ) pūrvapuṇyaskandhaḥ uttarapuṇyaskandhasyāsya śatatamīmapi kalāṃ [Vajraṭ_182] nopaiti iti /
SA14kamvchtu:253_6: na tu sarṣapaḥ / kalām ityaṃśaḥ, sa ca samānajātīya eva, yathā sumeroḥ kalā parvataśikharameva,
SA14kamvchtu:253_7: na tu tṛṇaśikharaḥ / gaṇanām ityapi tulyeṣvev, yathā sumerurapi giriḥ, himavānapi giriḥ, na tu sarṣapaḥ / upamām ityapi sadṛśeṣveva, yathā gosadṛśo gavaya ityucyute,
SA14kamvchtu:253_8: na tu makṣikā / laghurapi parikarmavaśena tasya (mahataḥ) kṛtyaṃ karoti,
SA14kamvchtu:253_9: yathā niśite kṛte sati dātramapyasikṛtyaṃ karotīti matvā upaniṣadam ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:253_11: ata eva aupamyamapi ityāha / tasyopamābhāvamapi na kṣamate /
SA14kamvchtu:254_2: api ca pariśuddhe kāle sarvasattvānāmapi pariśuddhatvānnāścaryām,
SA14kamvchtu:254_3: apariśuddhe tāvat kāle ye sattvā kṣaṇamātramaśyapariśuddhā bhavanti,
SA14kamvchtu:255_1: ..... tasmin samaye ityādyāha / tena bahulaṃ paridīpitam / tatpuṇyagaṇanayāpi viṣādamanuprāpya [Vajraṭ_183] vyāmugdhacittāntarviśeṣe unmādamanuprāpnuyuḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:256_0: evamasnād dharmaparyāyāt saṃkhyāprabhāvapratisaṃyuktamevaṃvidhaṃ phalaṃ kathaṃ jñāyata iti? api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:258_0: evaṃ nirākṛte 'pi dhyānasāsvāde pratyāsanne 'bhisamayakāleṃ yaiḥ bodhisattvaiḥ ātmavaiśiṣṭyamavalokya 'ahaṃ samyaksambodhimārgapratipannaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:258_3: kathaṃ pratipattavyam, kathaṃ cittaṃ pragrahītavyam? ityetad darśayituṃ pañcadaśasthāmadhikṛtyāha- sūbhūti.
SA14kamvchtu:258_4: ...... avocat- kathaṃ bhagavan, bodhisattvayānasamprasthitena sthātavyam iti /
SA14kamvchtu:258_6: nāsti subhūte, sa kaścid dharmo yo bodhisattvayānasamprasthito nāma ityavaśiṣṭenātra ātmagrāhavisaṃyogaḥ kriyate /
SA14kamvchtu:259_0: yathedaṃ pudgaladharmanairātmyaṃ prāgeva bhagavatā prakāśitaṃ tathokte sati bodhisattveṣu punaḥ abhisamayakāle kathamātmagrāhaḥ sambhaved? tannirākaraṇāyoktamapi kiṃ punarucyate? athaivamapi deśanāyāṃ saṃmuhyet prāguktasyānavasthānaṃ ca syāditi? tathā deśite 'pi anādikālātyantadṛḍhībhūtātmābhiniveśavaśatayā keṣāñcit sammohasyānivṛtteḥ deśito 'pyarthaḥ punarupadiśyate /
SA14kamvchtu:259_2: bhagavatā kṛtasyopadeśasya phalaṃ tāvat sammohavinivṛttireva vineyajanānāmiti na niṣphalam /
SA14kamvchtu:259_3: ata eva sammohanirvṛtau satyāṃ phalābhāvena punaḥ pravṛttyabhāvāt prakṛtamevedam /
SA14kamvchtu:261_0: yadi bodhisattvayānasamprasthito nāma na syāt sa kaścid dharmaḥ (tarhi) kathaṃ bhagavān dīpaṅkarasya śāsturantikādavavādaṃ prāpya anuttarāṃ samyaksambomabhisambuddhaḥ? atha na syād (saḥ) abhisambuddhaḥ (tarhi) abhisamayakāṅkṣiṇāvavādo na paryeṣṭavya iti ye manyante,
SA14kamvchtu:261_1: teṣāmavavādaviyogavisaṃyogāya ṣoḍaśasyāmadhikṛtya tatkiṃ manse subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:261_3: idānīmabhisamayakāle abhisambuddhasya tasya niṣedhaḥ kriyate 'to na punaruktatā /
SA14kamvchtu:261_4: nāsti paramārthataḥ sa kaścidapi jñānajñeyātmako dharmaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:261_5: yathā pūrvaṃ vicāritam / tadbalena avicāraramaṇīyamātratayā śrutamayyādiprajñopādakameṇa bhagavataḥ- [Vajraṭ_185] svayambhūsarvajñajñānaṃ tathyasaṃvṛtyā grāhyātmakaṃ samudbhavati /
SA14kamvchtu:262_0: nanu tadapi bhagavato dīpaṅkarasyānubhāvamātramiti ced? evaṃ satyapi anurūpameva,
SA14kamvchtu:262_3: yadi na syādabhisambuddhaḥ (kaścit tarhi) kathaṃ tena samyaksaṃbodhau bhagavān vyākṛta iti vicārya sacet punaḥ sūbhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:263_0: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- yadi bhagavataḥ pratyātmavedyo dharmaḥ paramārthato tathābhūto bhavart tadā syādabhisambuddhaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:263_3: ityevaṃ viparītābhiniveśāt tathāgatasya vyākaraṇaṃ na bhavet /
SA14kamvchtu:263_5: iti na bhavati, na ca dharmodiṣvapyabhiniveśaḥ bhavati /
SA14kamvchtu:264_0: nāsti sa kaścid dharmo 'bhisambuddhaḥ ityanena arthato dīpaṅkarasyāntikād avavādagrāhavikalpaṃ vipakṣatvena darśayitvā tadvikalpaprahāṇāya chandaḥ praṇidhānaṃ cāpi deśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:265_1: yadi tathāgatena samyaksambuddhena na syāt sa kaścid dharmo yo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau abhisambuddhaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:265_2: tadā kathaṃ tathāgatatvaṃ bhavet? tadyathā pūrvabuddhā abhisambodhiṃ gatāḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:265_3: tathaivātrāpi gatatvādabhisambuddhastathāgata ucyata iti cet? abhisambuddha ityākhyasya kasyacid dharmasyābhāvāt tatkathaṃ bhavediti vicintya tatkasya hetoḥ iti pṛṣṭhavān /
SA14kamvchtu:265_6: sa candiśāntādisvabhāvaḥ, sarvadharmasādhāraṇatvāt sā bhūtaḥ iti vacanena viśeṣitā,
SA14kamvchtu:265_8: tasyāstathatāyā yā paramārthato 'nupannadharmatā sa tathāgata ityucyate /
SA14kamvchtu:267_3: ucyata iti vākyārthaḥ / tasya ca paramārthato 'nutpannatvānnāsti kaścid grāhyo grāhako vā /
SA14kamvchtu:267_5: tathyasaṃvṛtimāśrītya tena viśiṣṭajñānena yathā abhisambuddhaḥ tathā gata ityevamabhiprāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:268_1: paramārthāśrayeṇābhisambuddha iti kasmāttathā nocyate? iti cintāyāṃ yaḥ kaścit subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:268_2: tatkasya hetoḥ? iti na satyam ityanena yogjam /
SA14kamvchtu:268_5: iti vyavasthaiva kathaṃ vyavasthāpyata iti vicārya yaśca dharmaḥ ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:268_7: tatra na satyam itiḥ māyāvatpratibhāsamānānāṃ vicāryamāṇānāmatyantaśūnyatvenānutpannatvāt śaśaśrṛṅgavad atyantābhāvaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:268_9: athavā nāpi satyam, na kasyāpi dharmasya paramārthataḥ siddheḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:268_10: na mṛṣā, na ca vicāragocaraḥ kaścit satyaḥ siddhaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:269_0: anenādhyāropāpavādāntau nirākṛtya madhyamamārgaṃ ca vyavasthāpya yogasamāpattau pravarttyate /
SA14kamvchtu:269_1: tasmāt ityevaṃ paramārthataḥ sarvadharmāṇāmanutpādāt na satyaṃ na ca mṛṣā /
SA14kamvchtu:271_0: ityādi / sarvadharmā buddhadharmāḥ iti tathāgato bhāṣate /
SA14kamvchtu:271_1: yadyanutpannā evāmī dharmāstat kathaṃ sarvadharmāḥ ityucyanta iti pravicintya sarvadharmā iti subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:271_5: kintvaparamārthaṃ khalvavicāritamāśritya yasmāt svasāmānyalakṣaṇagrahaṇaṃ tasmāt sarvadharmāḥ ityucyante,
SA14kamvchtu:271_6: na tu paramārthataḥ, tatra sthitānāṃ sarveṣāṃ dṛśyamānatve 'pyabhāvāt /
SA14kamvchtu:273_0: yadi na syāt sa kaścid dharmo bhagavatābhisambuddhaḥ kathaṃ (tarhi) bodhisattvā upādattamavavādaṃ sammukhīkṛtya dharmapudgalanairātmyamadhigaccheyuḥ? iti vicintyābhisamayapratipādanārthaḥ tadyathāpi nāma ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:273_4: tatra yajjñānaprāptyā tathāgatagotre samutpadya buddhagotre niyato jāyate tad gotrasamparigrahajñānam /
SA14kamvchtu:273_6: upeta ityātmanā parigṛhītaḥ, kāyastu tathāgatakāyaḥ / yena so 'dhigataḥ, sa upetakāyaḥ / kathaṃ jñāyate tajjñānaprāptirityāha- mahākāyaḥ iti /
SA14kamvchtu:274_0: anena pudgaladharmanairātmyasamatājñānaṃ samavāpya abhisamayaḥ sampradarśyata ityato gotrajñānamabhidhīyate /
SA14kamvchtu:274_1: tena samatājñānena pudgaladharmanairātmyadhigamya sarve [Vajraṭ_189] sattvā ātmani (ātmavat) saṅgṛhītā bhavanti /
SA14kamvchtu:274_2: tasmāt samastasattvakāyānāmātmani saṅgraheṇa sa mahākāya iti /
SA14kamvchtu:274_3: nāpyapārthako 'yaṃ śabdaḥ, evaṃ sarvasattvānāmātma- saṅgraheṇa sa kāya ityucyate /
SA14kamvchtu:275_0: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- bodhisattvānāmabhisamayo 'pyayaṃ tathyasaṃvṛtimāśritya viśiṣṭajñānotpādamātreṇa prabhāvito bhavati /
SA14kamvchtu:275_1: paramārthato na kiñcinnirūpakaṃ nirūpyaṃ veti darśayitum,
SA14kamvchtu:275_5: upetakāyo mahākāya iti nimittamātrābhidhānena bodhiasattvānāṃ sarvadharmeṣvabhiniveśo nivartate /
SA14kamvchtu:275_7: gambhīryamapyuktam, samāropānto 'pi nirākṛtaḥ / pūrveṇa tāvadapavādāntaḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:276_0: yadi tathāgatena sa eva kāyo syāt noktaḥ syāt tadā prāptābhisamayo bodhisattvaṃ 'evaṃ mayā bodhisattvābhisamayaḥ samprāptaḥ sāmpratamahaṃ sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmi';
SA14kamvchtu:276_1: ityetat kathaṃ sañcitayetyanyadīyaṃ sadvikalpaṃ samudīkṣya nirabhimānitayābhisamayaṃ darśayituṃ yo bodhisattvaṃ ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:276_2: anena ya evaṃ vadet- ahaṃ sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmīti 'ahaṃ ya evaṃ vadet- ahaṃ sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmīti';
SA14kamvchtu:276_3: ahaṃ bodhiasattvo 'smi [Vajraṭ_190] ityabhimānī sa tathyato na bodhisattvaḥ iti darśyate /
SA14kamvchtu:276_5: dharmaḥ iti tu rupādiasvabhāvo vā pudgalādisvabhāvo va /
SA14kamvchtu:276_6: yuktito vicāraṇāyāṃ tasya dharmasyādṛsṭatvād āryasubhūtirapyāha no hīdam iti /
SA14kamvchtu:276_7: tasyā yukteḥ sarvatra sādhāraṇatvād bhagavān nairātmyadvayāvatāraṇārthaṃ tasmād ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:276_9: niḥsvabhāvā api draṣṭavyāḥ / anena vikṣepanigraho nirdiṣṭaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:279_0: tatra yadi na syāt kaścid bodhisattvo nāma dharmaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:279_1: (tarhi) kastāvad buddhakṣetraṃ pariniṣpādayituṃ yatnaṃ kuryāt? ityāśaṅkāṃ nirākartuṃ buddhakṣetrapariśuddhisampadamadhikṛtya- yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvaḥ ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:279_2: so 'pi tathaiva vaktavyaḥ ityabhimānitvānnocyate sa bodhisattva ityarthaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:279_7: anena kṣetravyūheṣu māyopamatvādhimuktyā bodhisattvena kathaṃ sthātavyamityetad darśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:280_0: yadi paramārthato na syuste kṣetravyūhāḥ (tadā) bhagavatā kathamuktā iti vicintya tatkasya hetoḥ? ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:280_1: pūrvavadasya vyākhyānam / na ceyaṃ punaruktiḥ / pūrvaṃ tāvadadhimukticaryābhūmisthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ bodhisattvakṣetrapariśuddhau praṇidhānāvasthāyāṃ bodhisattvavikalpasya niṣedhārtham (uktāḥ),
SA14kamvchtu:280_2: samprati buddhekṣetrapariśuddhipariniṣpattaye ye bodhisattvā evaṃvidhenābhiniveśena pravartante,
SA14kamvchtu:280_3: yeṣāṃ caivaṃvidho vikalpaḥ, tannirākaraṇārthamuktam / na cānavasthāprasaṅga, tadaivaṃvidhasya kasyaciditaravikalpasyāsambhavāt /
SA14kamvchtu:281_0: aneneha bodhisattvena kathaṃ pratipattavyaṃ tad vyapadiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:281_1: kīdṛśo bodhisattvo nāmetyatra yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvaḥ ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:281_2: nirātmāno dharmāḥ iti dviruktayā dvividhena nairātmyena sarvadharmāṇāṃ nairātmyaṃ darśyate /
SA14kamvchtu:281_3: bodhisattvo bodhisattvaḥ iti dviruktyā tadeva dvividhaṃ nairātmyajñānaṃ darśyate /
SA14kamvchtu:282_0: tena kiṃ darśayiṣyata iti ced? kena niṣpādyante yadi pudgalādigrāhakābhāvaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:284_0: yadi nāsti bodhisattvo nāmaḥ kaścid dharmaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:284_1: tadā tathāgataḥ pariśuddhadarśanena pariśuddhajñānena ca yukta eva na bhavet,
SA14kamvchtu:284_5: tasmād yasyāṃ saṃnipatitatāyāṃ pariṣadhevaṃ vikalpo bhavet,
SA14kamvchtu:284_6: tasyāḥ kṛte pariśuddhaṃ darśanaṃ jñānañcetyanuttaradvayamadhikṛtya tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:285_0: anena paramārthataḥ bodhisattvo nāma sa kaścid dharmo na bhavati,
SA14kamvchtu:285_1: tathāpi saṃvṛtau puṇyajñānasambhāraṃ paripūrya pariśuddhaṃjñānadarśanābhyāṃ yastathāgato bhavati,
SA14kamvchtu:285_3: anyathā saṃvṛtāvapi yadi sa na bhavet tadā kastathāgato bhavedityevaṃ tāvat darśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:285_4: tatra saṃvidyate tathāgatasya prajñācakṣuḥ ityeva tāvannocyate,
SA14kamvchtu:285_5: (api tu) viśiṣṭaṃ viśuddhadarśanamabhidhātuṃ cakṣuṣo vidyāmānatvaṃ darśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:286_2: paramārthasatyagrāhakam, saṃvṛtisatyagrāhakam, sarvākārajñeyagrāhakaṃ ca / rūpagrāhakamapi dvividham- karmaphalaṃ bhāvanāphalañceti /
SA14kamvchtu:286_3: pañcavidhaṃ cakṣuḥ kramaśaḥ- tatra sthūlaviṣayatvāt prathamaṃ rūpagrāhakaṃ kathitam,
SA14kamvchtu:286_4: paramārthavaśena saṃvṛtijñānaṃ pariśuddhadhyatītyataḥ pūrvaṃ paramārthasatyagrāhakaṃ paścācca saṃvṛtisatyagrāhakamabhihitamiti saṅgacchate kramanirdeśaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:286_7: na tu pudgala iti pudgalaśūnye dharmamātre dharmacakṣuḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:290_3: yathā pūrvaṃ vicāritam, evaṃ sati kathaṃ prajñāsyete tathāgatasya māṃsacakṣurādividyamānatā cittadhārā ceti cittāśayaṃ viditvā tatkasya hetoḥ? ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:290_4: bodhisattvena kathamanayordvayorviśuddhayoryogasamāpattyā pratipattavyam? ityetadabhidhātuṃ cittadhārā cittadhārā ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:290_5: paramārthataḥ adhārā iti / svabhāvato 'sattve 'pi saṃvṛtimadhikṛtyāha- tenocyate cittadhāreti iti /
SA14kamvchtu:290_6: anyathā paramārthataḥ sarvavāggocarātītatvānna vaktuṃ śakṣyata ityabhiprāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:290_7: cittadhāretyupalakṣaṇam / māṃsacakṣurādīnyapi cakṣuḥsvabhāvarahitānyeva uktānīti kathanaṃ prakṛtaṃ sākṣānnoktam /
SA14kamvchtu:291_0: atra kathaṃ cittaṃ pragrahītavyamiti tadabhidhātumāha tatkasya hetoḥ? iti /
SA14kamvchtu:291_6: yathā traikālikacittasya paramārthato 'bhāvastathā pūrvamuktaṃ vakṣyate ca /
SA14kamvchtu:293_0: yadi nāsti traikālikaṃ cittaṃ tadā puṇyaskandho 'pi na syāt,
SA14kamvchtu:293_1: cittāśritatvāttasya / tataḥ tathāgatasya puṇyaskandhādhipatyasampadaṃ sampādayituṃ kathaṃ bodhisattvo yatnaṃ kūryāditi vicintya puṇyaskandhādhipatyasampadamadhikṛtya- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:293_2: anena kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yo 'ntaśo ratnādikaṃ bāhyavastu tyajati,
SA14kamvchtu:293_3: so 'pi (yadi) mahāpuṇyaskandhena yukto bhavati (tadā) kathaṃ na tathāgatasya asaṃkhyeyāprameyakalpeṣu duṣkarānekaśatānyabhyasyataḥ puṇyaskandhādhipatyaṃ syādityevaṃ deśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:294_0: ata eva paramārthato 'satyapi puṇyaskandhe saṃvṛtau sattvād bodhisattvena tatra vaśībhāvaṃ niṣpādayituṃ chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamityādarśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:294_1: anenaudāryamapyuktam / kathaṃ na paramārthataḥ puṇyaskandhasattvaṃ vyavasthāpyata iti vicintya 'bodhisattvenātra kathaṃ pratipattavyam,
SA14kamvchtu:294_4: sacet iti 'yadi'; ityarthaḥ / na tathāgato 'bhāṣiṣyat iti paramārthato 'bhidhānaṃ nācariṣyat /
SA14kamvchtu:294_7: anena tathāgatasya puṇyaskandhādhipatyasampadaṃ pariniṣpādayituṃ prasthitena bodhisattvena paramārthatastadanupalambhena yogasamāpattyā pratipattavyam /
SA14kamvchtu:296_0: yadi puṇyaskandho naiva syāt tadā tathāgatānāṃ dvividhā kāyalakṣaṇasampad-anuvyañjanakāyasampad,
SA14kamvchtu:296_2: sā naiva syāt, kāraṇābhāvāt / tasmāt tathāgatasya dvividhāṃ kāyasampadaṃ pariniṣpādayituṃ kathaṃ bodhisattvairyatno 'nuṣṭheya iti vicintayadbhyastathāgatasya rūpakāyasampadamadhikṛtya- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:297_2: tato 'yamatrāryasubhūterāśayaḥ- yathā paramārthato 'skandha eva puṇyaskandhastathā rūpakāyo 'pyunutpanna eva /
SA14kamvchtu:297_3: ataḥ paramārthataḥ na rūpakāyapariniṣpattyā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ ityucyate /
SA14kamvchtu:298_0: tasmād bodhisattvena māyānirmitabuddhasya tathāvidharūpādhimuktayā tatpratipattaye chanda-praṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti deśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:298_1: nāpyatra punaruktitā / pūrvamadhimukticaryābhūmau rūpakāyāptikāmatākāle tathāgatapūjāsatkārakāle ca tathāvidho 'bhiniveśaḥ parivarjitaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:298_2: samprati śuddhādhyāśayabhūmau tathāgatarūpakāyasampadaṃ [Vajraṭ_197] pariniṣpādayituṃ samprasthitasya bodhisattvasya rūpe 'bhiniveśo bhavatīti yāsāṃ prasiddhistāsāṃ pariṣadāṃ durvikalpo nirākṛta ityuktatvāt /
SA14kamvchtu:299_0: evaṃ tarhi tathāgatānāṃ rūpakāyaḥ kasmād deśita iti vicintya tatkasya hetoḥ? ityapṛcchat /
SA14kamvchtu:299_1: na rūpakāyapariniṣpattyā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ ityanena yojanīyam /
SA14kamvchtu:299_2: nāsau tāvat sidhyati, avapavirūpeṇa paramāṇusañcayarūpeṇa vā rūpasyāsiddhatvād,
SA14kamvchtu:299_3: yathā vicāritaṃ prāk / anena bodhisattvena kathaṃ pratipattavyam,
SA14kamvchtu:299_4: tannirdiṣṭam / tena iti ityaṃ saṃvṛtau bhāvaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:299_6: anena cāpavādāntaṃ parihṛtya kathaṃ cittaṃ pragrahītavyam,
SA14kamvchtu:299_8: saṃvṛtau tathāgatasya rūpakāyasampadaṃ niṣpādayituṃ bodhisattvaiḥ karaṇīyānāṃ yatnānāṃ nidarśanena ādāryamapi dīpitam /
SA14kamvchtu:301_0: lakṣaṇakāyasampadamadhikṛtya tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityadyāha / atra pūrvavat sarvamabhihiatam /
SA14kamvchtu:303_0: yadi rūpakāyapariniṣpattyāa na tathāgato draṣṭavya iti cet,
SA14kamvchtu:303_2: rūpakāyena saṃgṛhītvāt tasyāḥ? ato [Vajraṭ_198] bodhisattavaistathāgatasya vāksampadaṃ niṣpādayituṃ kathaṃ yatnaḥ karttavya iti vicintayadbhyo vāksampadamadhikṛtya tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:303_3: paramārthato vācya-vācaka-vacanānāmabhāvāt na tathāgatasyaivaṃ bhavati mayā dharmo deśita iti /
SA14kamvchtu:303_5: yathā vācakāḥ ātmādayaḥ, vācyā bāhyādhyātmikā bhāvāḥ, vacanāni karaṇarūpāṇi śabdasvabhāvābhāvātmakāni vā tathā vistareṇa prāgevoktāni /
SA14kamvchtu:303_7: saṃvṛtau vācya-vācaka-vacanānām avicāraramaṇīyatvena vyavahāramātra eva (te) bhavanti,
SA14kamvchtu:304_0: yadi vastutattvasyaivamabhidhāne 'pi vyāmohena kicit paramārthatastrayāṇāṃ (teṣāṃ) parāmārthasattvaṃ kalpayeyastadā 'kiṃ nu syāt';
SA14kamvchtu:304_2: abhyācakṣīta ityabhyālapet / kathaṃ tadabhūtamālapituṃ śakyata iti vicāraṇāyāmāha asatodgṛhītena iti /
SA14kamvchtu:304_4: anena tathāgatasya vāksampadi pravṛttena bodhisattvena pratiśrutkādivajjñātvā pravartitavyamiti,
SA14kamvchtu:305_0: yadi vacanāditrayamasat (tadā) pudgaladharmanairātmyadeśakena bhagavatā nānāpadavākyātmikeyaṃ dharmadeśanā kathaṃ prasidhyati? tasyāṃ satyāṃ tadabhidheyo vācyo 'pi syādeva,
SA14kamvchtu:305_1: yaśca taddeśako vācakaḥ, so 'pi bhavedeva / tadbalena trīṇyapi (vācya-vācaka-vacanāni) bhaveyuriti cintāyāṃ tatkasya hetoḥ? iti pṛṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:306_0: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- paramārthataḥ dharmadeśanāyāṃ satyāṃ (sā) svalakṣaṇasvabhāvā vā syāt sāmānyalakṣanasvabhāvā vā /
SA14kamvchtu:306_2: sarvaṃ pāramārthikaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ tāvat pūrvameva vistareṇa nirākṛtam /
SA14kamvchtu:306_3: na ca dbitīyo 'pi [Vajraṭ_199] asati svalakṣaṇe ādhārasyābhāvena kasyacidapyasattvāt /
SA14kamvchtu:306_4: sāmānyadravyatvābhyupagame svalakṣaṇa eva saṅgṛhītaṃ syāditi tanniṣedhena tasyāpi niṣedha eva /
SA14kamvchtu:306_5: anyavyāvṛttyā sāmānyalakṣaṇamadhyāropitasvabhāvamiti parikalpite sati dharmadeśanāyā nairarthakyatvena siddhasādhanam /
SA14kamvchtu:307_0: tasyāḥ (śabdātmikāyā deśanāyāḥ) paramārthataḥ svalakṣaṇasattve 'pi na yujyate tayā dharmadeśanā /
SA14kamvchtu:307_1: sphoṭādiśabdasya nityasvabhāvasya paraiḥ padatvena parikalpitasya kramākramābhyāmarthakriyākāritvaṃ tāvad virudhyate,
SA14kamvchtu:307_3: akiñcitkaratvena kathaṃ tad bhavet padam? anityasyāpi tāvat svalakṣaṇasva na yujyate padatvam,
SA14kamvchtu:307_5: na hi yujyate anyasya saṅketo 'nyasya ca vyavahāraḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:307_6: atiprasaṅgāt / ata eva svalakṣaṇamapyabhidhātuṃ na yujyate,
SA14kamvchtu:307_7: ananvayāt / sāmānyapadārthe 'bhidheyatvenābhyupagate sati abhidheyasvabhāvatvena tasya svalakṣaṇasvarūpatvānna hi pradeśāntaragamanam /
SA14kamvchtu:308_0: ekatvaṃ tu deśakālādibhinnāsvanekavyaktiṣvanugatamapi na yujyate tathā hi- (atha) ekasyāṃ vyaktau sarvātmanā vyāptaṃ syāt tadā yena ekatvena parikalpitaḥ sa svabhāvastena anyatrādhigatetaravyaktibhiḥ sambaddhaḥ taditarasvabhāvastatra na bhavediti,
SA14kamvchtu:308_1: ekatvahāniprasaṅgāt / (atha) ekadeśena vyāptaṃ syāt tadā sāvayatvāgrahaṇadoṣaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:308_2: evaṃ yāvatyo bhinnavyaktayastāsāmekadeśena vyāptivyavasthayā tāvatīnāṃ grahaṇaṃ syāttadā ekavyaktigrahaṇaṃ tāvadekadeśagrahaṇena yuktaṃ bhavet,
SA14kamvchtu:308_3: bhinnavyaktiṣu deśakālaparimāṇādibhinnāsu tāsvekavyaktigrahaṇaṃ tāvadekadeśagrahaṇād yugapudgrahaṇābhāva eva /
SA14kamvchtu:309_0: yena yena hi nāmnā vai yo yo dharmo 'bhilapyate /
SA14kamvchtu:309_2: na sa saṃvidyate tatra dharmāṇāṃ sā hi dharmatā //
SA14kamvchtu:310_0: vacanaṃ mithyā, vācya-vācyakānāṃ yā deśanā taddvārā āgatā,
SA14kamvchtu:310_1: sāpi spaṣṭaiva / ubhayorabhāvo bhagavatā pṛthakatvena noktaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:313_0: tatredānīmevaṃ gambhīradharmo 'yamanāgate kāle ghanībhūte kudṛṣṭijāle kathaṃ saphalo bhaviṣyatīti nābhiśraddhadhanti parivārāḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:313_1: ya evaṃ cintayanti teṣāmaviśrambhaṃ nivārayitum āryasubhūtiścittasampatsu smṛtyupasthānamadhikṛtya bhagavan ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:313_2: bhagavatāpyanāgate 'dhvani śīlavanto guṇavantaśca bhaviṣyantīti kiṃ noktapūrvam /
SA14kamvchtu:313_3: samprati teṣāṃ sattve 'sattve vā ekāntenānabhiniveśaṃ deśayitum asti iti noktam,
SA14kamvchtu:314_1: paramārthataḥ skandhapudgalādīnāṃ satsvabhāvānupalambhāt na sattvāḥ ityanenādhyāropāntaniṣedhaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:314_3: bhaviṣyanti ityanayā deśanayā bhagavataḥ kīdṛgaviparītasmṛtyupasthānamiti sattvebhyo darśayitvā bhagavatastasyāṃ smṛtyupasthānasampadi bodhisattvena chanda-praṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti nirdiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:314_4: na te sattvāḥ nāsattvāḥ? ityanena yogasamāpattinirdiṣṭā /
SA14kamvchtu:315_0: yadi na te sattvāḥ syustadā kathaṃ bhagavatā 'bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani śīlavanto guṇavantaśca te';
SA14kamvchtu:315_1: ityādyuktamityevaṃ parivitarkaṃ vicāryaṃ tatkasya hetoḥ? ityapṛcchat /
SA14kamvchtu:315_5: anyathā saṃvṛtāvapyasattve na (te) bhāṣitāḥ syurityanena cittapragraho darśitaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:317_0: yadi na syād bhagavataḥ kācidapi dharmadeśanā,
SA14kamvchtu:317_1: tadā na syāt (saḥ) samyaksambuddho 'pi tatastathāgatābhisambodhisiddhaye vyarthaḥ syād bodhisattvānāṃ yatnaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:317_3: ato deśanāpi bhavatīti manvānebhyaḥ [Vajraṭ_202] tebhyo 'bhisambodhim adhikṛtya tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:317_4: āryasubhūtiḥ pūrvābhiprāyaṃ gṛhītvā nāsti saḥ ityudatarat /
SA14kamvchtu:317_5: tadevaṃ manyate- paramārthābhiprāyeṇa bhagavatā dharmadeśanā pratiṣiddheti /
SA14kamvchtu:317_6: yathā paramārthataḥ kasyāścidapi dharmadeśanāyā abhāvaḥ (tathā) abhisambuddhasyāpyabhāvaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:318_5: iti yo vikalpaḥ, sa apanoditaḥ, idānīṃ buddhabhūmiparyeṣaṇakāle pareṣāṃ tādṛgvikalpanirākaraṇānna bhavati punaruktidoṣaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:319_2: yatra jñānaṃ pracarati (tatra) bhagavatā grāhyasvarūpasya svalakṣaṇasya sūkṣmo 'pi dharmasvabhāvo nopalabdhaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:319_8: vidyamānatve nānupalabdhiḥ, satsu sarvadharmeṣu tathāgatasya ālambanajñānasyaiva jñāpakatvāt /
SA14kamvchtu:320_1: sāmprataṃ pudgalanairātmyāvabodhasvabhāvaṃ pratipādayituṃ api tu khalu punaḥ sūbhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:320_2: samāḥ sa dharmaḥ iti tadavabodhiteṣu sarvadharmeṣu pudgalanairātmyasāmyāt /
SA14kamvchtu:320_3: na tatra kiñcidviṣamam iti sarvatra tadaviparyayāt,
SA14kamvchtu:320_8: nānyā / kena rūpeṇa samaḥ sa dharma ityatra niḥsattvatvena ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:320_9: anena sarveṇa kathaṃ yogasamāpattyā pratipattavyamiti tannirdiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:321_1: kathaṃ nāma bhaveyuḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ? yatastairabhisambuddhyate 'taḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:321_2: paramārthāstu ardhamā eva / saṃvṛtau sattvāt kuśalā dharmāḥ ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:323_0: bhagavataḥ sā samyaksambodhiḥ kathaṃ veditvayā? iti vicāryamāṇe mahārthadharmatayā prajñāpitatvena tatsattāṃ darśayituṃ yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte [Vajraṭ_204] ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:323_2: anantalokadhātūn ratnaiḥ paripūrya dānena yat puṇyaṃ tadapi upamāṃ naiva kṣamate /
SA14kamvchtu:323_3: itaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ ityupalakṣaṇamātraparidīpanena sakalo mahāyānadharmaḥ parilakṣito bhavati /
SA14kamvchtu:323_4: yāvad iti vacanena sahasratamī kalā- 'śatasahasratamī kalā .
SA14kamvchtu:323_5: ......... upamā-aupamyamityetāni'; saṃgṛhyante / evaṃ mahārthadharmaprajñapanena hetunā bhagavataścittasampadaḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ ānuttaryamavagamyate,
SA14kamvchtu:324_4: na tu paramārthataḥ, prāgevoktatvāt, sākṣādanuktamapi sāmarthyataḥ yogasamāpattiḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:324_7: bhagavato lokottarajñānāvasthāyāṃ sattvasaṃjñā sarvathā na pravartate,
SA14kamvchtu:324_8: atyantasamāhitatvāt, ado nāścaryam / sattvebhyo vimuktayupadeśakāle 'samāhitāvasthāyāṃ viśuddhalaukikajñānāvasthāyāmapi sattvādisaṃjñā na pravartata iti tannirdiśya avavādamahārthatvena prajñaptihetunā bhagavato 'nuttaracittasampadaṃ [Vajraṭ_205] pratipatsyamānāṃ darśayituṃ mahārthāvavādamadhikṛtya tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:324_9: praśnasyottaramapratīkṣamāṇaḥ sapadi svataḥ na khalu punaḥ subhūte,
SA14kamvchtu:324_10: evaṃ draṣṭavyam ityādyāha / tasmād bhagavataścittasampadastādṛśe mahārthāvavādahetau bodhisattvena chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti nirdiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:325_0: kiṃ sattvānāṃ sattve 'pi saṃkleśahetubhūtatayā tathā nābhipreyate tathāgatena? āhosvit sattvābhāvāditi cintayatāmāśayaṃ vijñāya tatkasya hetoḥ? iti papraccha /
SA14kamvchtu:325_1: skandhātmakasya pudgalātmakasya ca kasyacit sattvasya paramārthato 'bhāvād evaṃ nopalabhyata iti darśayitumāha- nāstiṃ kaścit sattvo yastathāgatena parimocittaḥ iti /
SA14kamvchtu:325_2: anena bodhisattvaiḥ kathamatra yogasamāpattyā pratipattavyamiti tannirdiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:326_0: abhāvaḥ kathaṃ jñātavya ityatra yadi punaḥ subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:326_3: tasmād yadi sattvaḥ syāt tadā sandṛśyeta sa tathāgatena,
SA14kamvchtu:326_5: sa eva tāvattasya pragāḍhaḥ ātmagrāhaḥ syāt /
SA14kamvchtu:326_6: tataśca ātmagrāhahetutaḥ samutpannaṃ nikhilakleśajālabandhanamapyatidṛḍhaṃ syāt tadā rāgādyatipragāḍhabaddhasya āvaraṇāprahāṇena bhagavataḥ tathāgatapadaprāptirna syāt /
SA14kamvchtu:327_0: ātmanyasati kimātmadṛṣṭilakṣaṇa ātmagrāho na bhavati? kimarthaṃ bhagavatā ātmādisaṃjñā nocyate? ityatra ātmagrāha iti subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:327_1: yadi (bhagavatā) ātmādivastuna eva grahaṇaṃ syāttadā prahīṇāvaraṇasya tasya bhagavata [Vajraṭ_206] ātmagrāhaḥ samudbhavet,
SA14kamvchtu:328_0: atha kīdṛśa ātmagrāha iti? sa ca ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:328_3: pṛthagjanā api kecit sacchāstraṃ śrutvā yoniśomanaskārasthitāḥ dharmanairātmyādhimuktāḥ satyamabhiniviśante,
SA14kamvchtu:328_5: bālamātrakathanāt skandhādyabhijñā api tādṛśāḥ pṛthagjanā anupajātāryamārgatayā bālā eva /
SA14kamvchtu:328_6: bālānāṃ vaiśiṣṭayamabhidhātuṃ vyāvṛtte 'pyātmagrāhe bālatvena teṣvātmagrāha ityavabhāsate,
SA14kamvchtu:329_0: na tanmātreṇa satyam, atiprasaṅgāt / anātmaśabdaprayogeṇāpi kathaṃ nātmādīnāṃ satyagrahaṇam,
SA14kamvchtu:329_1: yadyātmā na syāttadā ke tāvat pṛthagjanā abhidhīyeran? iti vicintya bālapṛthagjanāḥ ityādyuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:329_4: anena sarveṇa tāvat sākṣād gāmbhīryaṃ proktam /
SA14kamvchtu:331_0: yadi bālapṛthagjanāḥ na syuḥ, kathaṃ tathāgatasya lakṣaṇānuvyañjanairalaṅkṛtāḥ kāyasampadaḥ sambhaveyuḥ? pṛthagjanāḥ svakaruṇāmūlakabodhicittamutpādya pāramitāsu prayatante (tataśca) lakṣaṇādibhīralaṅkṛtāstathāgatakāyasampattivanto bhavanti,
SA14kamvchtu:331_1: tadabhāve mūlabhāvāt kathaṃ bhaveyuḥ tādṛyastathāgatakāyasampada iti? ye pāriṣadyāḥ [Vajraṭ_207] kṛtānalpavikalpāḥ rūpādiṣu bhāvābhiniveśenaivaṃ cintayanti,
SA14kamvchtu:331_2: tebhyo dharmakāyaparigrahamadhikṛtya tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:332_0: lakṣaṇasampadā tāvat paramārthavicāraṇāyāmavayavinaḥ paramāṇusaṃghātasya vā svabhāvenānupapattiṃ viditvā pūrvakamevābhiprāyaṃ gṛhṇan subhūtirāha no hīdam /
SA14kamvchtu:332_1: evameva upapattyantaraṃ bhagavatā sacet punaḥ subhūte ityādinoktam /
SA14kamvchtu:333_0: yadi tathāgato lakṣaṇasampanmātreṇa prabhāvitaḥ syāt tadā vakṣyamāṇahetunā tulyatvād rājāpi cakravartī kathaṃ na bhavet tathāgataḥ? nanu sthānasthottaptapūrṇatvena viśiṣṭā bhagavato lakṣaṇasampad,
SA14kamvchtu:333_1: na tu cakravartinaḥ, tataḥ sa nocyate tathāgata ityapi na yujyate,
SA14kamvchtu:333_3: tena yadi tathāgato jaḍasvabhāvairlakṣaṇādidharmaiḥ prabhāvito 'bhaviṣyat tadā cakravartī api tathāgato 'bhaviṣyat iti cet? na,
SA14kamvchtu:333_5: anena tathāvidhaṃ jñānahetukaṃ tathāgatakāyaṃ prati bodhisattvena chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti nirdiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:334_0: adhunā paramārthatastattathāgatajñāne 'pi nābhiniveṣṭavyamiti darśayituṃ dharmakāyo [Vajraṭ_208] vyavasthāpyate /
SA14kamvchtu:334_1: bodhisattvena kathaṃ yogasamāpattyā pratipattavyamiti dvābhyāṃ gāthābhyāṃ pradarśyate /
SA14kamvchtu:335_0: tatra pūrvagāthayā kathaṃ tathāgato na draṣṭavyaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:335_2: kathaṃ na draṣṭavya iti cet? darśanādivyavahāraprajñaptyā /
SA14kamvchtu:335_4: rūpeṇa cādrākṣuḥ ityanena rūpe 'bhiniviṣṭāḥ pudgalāḥ pāramārthikalakṣaṇādibhiralaṅkṛtaṃ dharmarūpaṃ pudgalarūpaṃ ca paśyantīti vyavahāraprajñaptirnidiṣṭā /
SA14kamvchtu:335_5: ghoṣeṇa cānvayuḥ iti māṃ śabdena evameva sa tathāgata iti jñātavanta ityarthaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:336_0: mithyāprahāṇaprasṛtāste janāḥ tāvad vitathāmārgasthitatvānna māṃ samyag rūpeṇa drakṣyanti /
SA14kamvchtu:337_0: atha kathaṃ buddhā draṣṭavyā ityatra dharmataḥ ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:337_2: sa 'dharmatā'; ityucyate / sā ca yuktyāgamābhyāṃ siddhatvādāditaḥ śāntādisvabhāvā /
SA14kamvchtu:337_3: saiva tathatā, dharmadhātuḥ, bhūtakoṭiḥ, animittaṃ paramārthaścetyādiparyāyairucyate /
SA14kamvchtu:338_0: sarvatra tathābhāvāt 'tathatā tadālambanena sarve buddhadharmāḥ sambhavanti /
SA14kamvchtu:338_2: aviparītatvād bhūtaḥ, tatparyantatvād bhūtakoṭiḥ / [Vajraṭ_209] tatra nīlādisarvavastunimittānāmabhāvād animittaṃ /
SA14kamvchtu:338_4: kimiti sā dharmatayā draṣṭavyetyatrāha- dharmakāyāḥ iti /
SA14kamvchtu:338_6: tenāyamarthaḥ- samyagjñānanibandhanā ye tathāgateṣu vyavasthāpitāste paramārthato dharmasvabhāvāḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:338_7: yo yatsvabhāvaḥ, sa tatsvabhāvena draṣṭavyaḥ, na tvanyasvabhāvena / yadyevaṃ tarhi dharmatā prakāśasvabhāvā bhavet,
SA14kamvchtu:338_8: anyathā kathaṃ tallakṣitāste draṣṭuṃ śakyanta iti vicārya dharmatā ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:339_0: kimaśakyatvād aparijñeyā athavā parijñāne doṣasadbhāvāditi vicintya na śakyā ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:339_2: yadā dharmisvabhāva eva kaścit paramārthato na siddhastadā kathaṃ sā dharmatāpi vijñātuṃ śakyate kevalayā svasantatyā /
SA14kamvchtu:340_0: yadyevaṃ samyagjñānasvabhāvānāṃ buddhanāmapi dharmiṇāṃ paramārthato 'siddhatvānna syād darśanam,
SA14kamvchtu:340_1: tatkathaṃ dharmatā draṣṭavyeti cet? naiṣa doṣaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:340_2: ye paramārthataḥ sarvadharmiṇo na paśyanti ta eva dharmatāṃ paśyanti /
SA14kamvchtu:341_0: asatyapi tathāgatasya lakṣaṇasampatsvabhāvatve yujyata eva lakṣaṇasampaddhetukaṃ tathāgatasyānuttarasamyaksambodhilakṣaṇam,
SA14kamvchtu:341_1: gaṇakaiḥ (lakṣaṇajñaiḥ) bodhisattvasya lakṣaṇasampadaṃ draṣṭvā bhagavān anuttarasamyaksambodhau vyākṛta iti [Vajraṭ_210] yeṣāṃ saṃśayaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:341_3: yadi lakṣaṇasampad anuttarasamyaksambodherhetuḥ syāt tadā cakravartino 'pi syādityabhiprāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:342_1: anena tāvat sakalena sthānena gāmbhīryaṃ darśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:342_2: saṃvṛtau cāśeṣavastusvabhāvādhimagalakṣaṇasya tathāgatajñānasya nirdeśena āudāryamapi nirdiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:344_0: paramārthataḥ sarvadharmāṇāmabhāvād yadi sā dharmatā vijñātuṃ na śakyata iti cet tata ucchedavādī bhavān syāt /
SA14kamvchtu:344_1: tataśca tathāgatasyāpyabhāvād apratiṣṭhitanirvāṇamapi na sidhyatīti yadāśaṅkitaṃ tadarthaṃ saṃsāranirvāṇayoḥ apratiṣṭhānamadhikṛtya subhūte .
SA14kamvchtu:346_2: sarve dharmo avicāraramaṇīyatayā yathābhūtaiḥ pratyayairutpadyamānā abhyupeyante,
SA14kamvchtu:346_3: ato bhagavatā buddhena tathyasaṃvṛtisvabhāvāyāḥ māhākaruṇāyā nirmāṇādau adhipatitvamādāya punarvineyebhyo yathāvadupāyopadarśanena [Vajraṭ_211] niravacchinnasaṃsārapravāho 'bhyupeyate /
SA14kamvchtu:346_5: tathāvidhe bhagavatkāye chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti tadapi nirdiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:348_1: tadā saṃsartā eva bhavatīti vikalpya saṃsāre 'pratiṣṭhitatvaṃ darśayituṃ yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:348_3: na svata ātmabhāvaḥ, nityasya kramakramābhyāṃ hetorvirodhāt,
SA14kamvchtu:348_4: ahetukasya akiñcitkaratvāt / svaparayornādhiṣṭhānamapi, adhiṣṭhāturevāsambhāvāt, tasmāt sarvadharmāste ubhayavidhāḥ nirātmakāḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:349_0: yathoktam : “ātmā ātmeti bhikṣavo bālo 'śrutavān pṛthgjanaḥ prajñaptimanupatitaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:349_1: na tvatrātmā vā ātmīyaṃ vā /” anena sarvadharmeṣu pudgalanairātmkṣāntiḥ sandarśitā /
SA14kamvchtu:350_0: yadi bhāvānāmutpādo bhaved, ahetuko vā bhavet, sahetuko vā / sahetuke 'pi nityahetuko vā anityahetuko veti vikaladvayam /
SA14kamvchtu:350_1: tatra na tāvat [Vajraṭ_212] prathamo vikalpaḥ kādācitkatvapratīteḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:350_2: nirapekṣasya sadasadavasthāsamatvena sarvatra nirviśiṣṭatvāt nityaṃ sattvamasattvaṃ vā syāt /
SA14kamvchtu:351_1: nityasya itaraiḥ sahakāribhistāvanna kaścit sāmarthyaviśeṣaḥ kriyate /
SA14kamvchtu:351_2: kutracidapyanapekṣaḥ san kimiva krameṇa kāryamutpādayenna yugapaditi /
SA14kamvchtu:352_4: taditarānyahetau cānabhīṣṭe kathaṃ na nirhetukaḥ syāt /
SA14kamvchtu:352_6: ataḥ sidhyati tatsiddhe, (phalataḥ) ahetuka eva syāt /
SA14kamvchtu:353_0: na tāvad yujyate tṛtīyapakṣo 'pi samānāsamānakālayoḥ kāraṇatvavirodhāt /
SA14kamvchtu:353_1: tathā hi, hetau sati sa phalena (kāryeṇa) samānakālo vā bhaved bhinnakālo vā? na tāvat samānakālāt,
SA14kamvchtu:353_3: ātmasvabhāve ca (prāpte) tatsvabhāvavat phalasyāpi tatsamānakālabhāvitayā ātmasvabhāvatvameva /
SA14kamvchtu:354_5: ucyete tathā syāditi? tatra taditarakālavyavadhānena phalotpāde sati vināśādevotpādaḥ abhyupagamyeta,
SA14kamvchtu:354_7: anyathā akārakasya vinaṣṭavastuno vināśāt kathaṃ (utpādaḥ) bhavet /
SA14kamvchtu:355_0: avyavadhāneneti pakṣe 'pi yadi sarvātmanā avyabahitastadā tadeva samakālatvaṃ syāt /
SA14kamvchtu:355_1: niravayavayordvayorvastunoḥ sarvātmanā avyavahitatve ekakālatvātiriktā nānyā gatiḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:355_2: tasmāt sarvātmanā avyavahite sati pūrvaṃ yathā aṇumātrakam (iti prasaktam),
SA14kamvchtu:356_1: ataḥ paramārthataḥ sarve bhāvā anutpannā eva /
SA14kamvchtu:356_4: (yadi) na syāt prasiddhamātraṃ pramāṇaṃ (tadā) 'kāryakāraṇayorāgopālaṃ prasiddhatvānna yujyate vimarśaḥ iti vādaḥ kathaṃ yujyeta,
SA14kamvchtu:357_0: na cakṣu pramāṇaṃ na śrotragrāṇaṃ na jihvā pramāṇaṃ na kāyacittam /
SA14kamvchtu:357_1: pramāṇaṃ yadyeta bhaveyurindriyāḥ kasyāryamārgeṇa bhavet kāryam //
SA14kamvchtu:357_3: yasmādime indriya apramāṇā jadā svabhāvena avyākṛtaśca /
SA14kamvchtu:357_4: tasmād ya nirvāṇapathaiva ārthikaḥ sa āryamārgeṇa karotu kāryam //
SA14kamvchtu:358_4: ato bhagavatā śālistambādiṣu bhāvānāṃ svaparodayo niṣiddhaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:360_1: na kaścid dharma utpannaḥ, sā (api) anutpannā” tatra yā prajñā,
SA14kamvchtu:362_0: sva eva yadā nāsti paro hetuḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
SA14kamvchtu:365_3: (tadā) anutpattikadharmakṣāntiprāptatvāt mahājñānālokodayā labdhānuttarapuṇyaskandhā bodhisattvāḥ kathaṃ saṃsāraduḥkham anubhaveyurityevamāveditam /
SA14kamvchtu:366_4: tatrānutpanneṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiprāptyā bodhisattveṣu nāstyubhayavidho duḥkhahetuḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:367_0: utpāditabahutarapuṇyaskandhā rūpāvacarādisattvā iva kiṃ (te) saṃsāra eva na bhavanti? kathaṃ vā bahutarapuṇyaskandhotpādamātreṇa saṃsāre 'pratiṣṭhitatvaṃ sandarśitamityāśaṅkya punaḥ subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:368_0: anena tāvad utpannapuṇyaskandhe 'pi teṣāṃ mithyābhiniveśena puṇyaskandhaparigrahasya sarvasaṃkleśamūlaviparyāsasyāprahīṇatvam,
SA14kamvchtu:368_1: ataḥ (te) viśiṣṭagatiṃ prāptā api saṃsāre vyavasthāpyante,
SA14kamvchtu:368_2: bodhisattvānāṃ tu anutpattikadharmakṣāntiprāpteḥ puṇyaskandheṣu nāsti satyābhiniveśaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:369_1: ityuktam / atra na parigrahītavyaḥ iti vacanena kathaṃ na virodha iti? bhagavānapi yenābhiprāyeṇoktavān tadubhayamapi darśayitumāha- parigrahītavyaḥ iti /
SA14kamvchtu:369_2: parigrahīta iti yadāha tattu parigrahalakṣaṇanaya upasaṃhāralakṣaṇaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:370_3: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prārabhya audāryamuktam,
SA14kamvchtu:370_5: etena sakalena sthānena śāśvatocchedāntaṃ parihṛtya madhyamamārgo deśitaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:374_1: na tu rūpakāyena, tadā bhagavataścaturīryāpathena janmābhiniṣkramaṇādinā cāgamaprasiddhena kathaṃ na virodha iti yo manyate tadarthaṃ prasthānasampada īryāpathena prasthitimadhikṛtya api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte yaḥ kaścid ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:375_0: gacchati vā āgacchati vā ityetaddvayena caṅkramaṇam,
SA14kamvchtu:375_3: bhagavata āgamena paridīpitānāmīryāpathādīnāṃ yaḥ samyaktayā śabdaśo 'bhiniveśastāsya viparītābhiniveśānna jānāti tathāgatena bhāṣitasyārtham /
SA14kamvchtu:376_2: asau tu jñānapariśuddhaḥ, tasyāmūrtatvājjñānasya saṃvṛtāvapi gatyādayo na sambhavanti /
SA14kamvchtu:376_5: na ca jñānakāyamāśritya, tatra saṃvṛtitaḥ paramārthato vā gatyādīnāmasambhavāt /
SA14kamvchtu:376_6: tasmād evaṃvidhāyāṃ īryāpathaprasthitau bodhisattvena chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti sandarśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:377_0: yadi tathāgate gatyādayo na saṃvidyante (tarhi) kathaṃ tathāgataḥ iti gatyā prabhāvita ivocyata iti cittāśayaṃ vitarkyāha- tatkasya hetoḥ? iti /
SA14kamvchtu:377_1: na me sa bhāṣitasyārthamājānāti ityanena yojanīyam /
SA14kamvchtu:378_1: api tu adhigamena prabhāvitaḥ gataḥ ityasyādhigatyarthatvāt /
SA14kamvchtu:378_2: vastutattvaṃ yathāsthitiḥ, tathaivādhigamyate, adhigatatvāt tathāgataḥ / athavā pūrvakairbuddhairyathā vastutattvamadhigatamaviparyayeṇa tathaivānenāpyadhigatamityadhigatatvāt tathāgataḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:378_4: na cānyatrāvikalpitatvāt / tacca gamanādi kvacit saṃvṛtāvapi na sambhavati,
SA14kamvchtu:378_6: anutpannatvāt / tataḥ sa vastusvabhāvādhigatyā samastalokasya jyeṣṭhatvāt pūjanīyatvāt arhan ityucyate,
SA14kamvchtu:378_8: anyathātvena jaḍasvabhāvena rūpakāyastu tathā nocyata iti bhāvaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:379_2: saṃvṛtau tathāgatasya nirmāṇakāyamāśritya anantalokadhātuṣu apratihatagamanādipradarśanena ādāryamapi pradarśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:381_1: yaśca manomayakāyaḥ, tasyāpi ekānekasvabhāvavisaṃyogānmāyānirmitabuddhavat mṛṣātvaṃ darśayituṃ bhājanasattvalokabhāvavigamāt prasthitimadhikṛtya yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:382_4: nanu digbhāgabhedena paramāṇavo 'siddhā (tadā) kathaṃ te sañcitāḥ? iti sañcintya tatkasya hetoḥ? ityāśaṅkyottaramāha (pariharannāha) saced bhagavan iti vijñaya ekatvagrāhakanivṛttyupāyārthameva paramāṇuprabhedena (yaḥ) sañcayaḥ sa ukto na tu paramārthato 'navasthitatvāt,
SA14kamvchtu:382_6: tasmāt na bhagavānavakṣyat paramāṇusañcaya iti abhāṣite 'pyevamākhyātatvāt /
SA14kamvchtu:382_7: anena tathāgatasya rūpābhāvatvena tādṛśyāṃ sthitau chanda-praṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti deśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:383_0: yadi na syāt sañcayaḥ (tadā) api nu bahuḥ sa paramāṇusañcayo bhavet? iti kasmād bhagavānavakṣyadityāśayaṃ viditvā tatkasya hetoḥ? ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:383_1: asañcayaḥ saḥ iti pūrvottarādidigbhāgabhedena avasthitānāṃ teṣāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ svabhāvenāsiddhatvānna yujyate tattvataḥ sañcayaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:384_0: asati ca digbhāgabhede paramāṇavaḥ paramāṇvantaraiḥ pūrvāparordhvādhodigbhāgabhedena parivṛtā na syuḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:384_2: bhāga eva bhavati paramāṇurityapi kathanaṃ na yujyate,
SA14kamvchtu:384_4: aniṣṭhitāḥ paramāṇavaḥ svabhāvena tarhi tvayā kiṃ sādhyate? aniṣṭhitasvabhāve bhāvo na sidhyati,
SA14kamvchtu:384_8: ye paramāṇavastvayā niravayavatvena vyavasthāpyante teṣāṃ pūrvottarādidigbhedābhyupetatvāt digbhāgabhedenābhyupagamyante,
SA14kamvchtu:386_1: na rūpe naiva netre ca tayormadhye 'pi na sthitaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:386_2: yatra sthito bhavettatra na sannaiva hi cāpyasat //
SA14kamvchtu:387_0: alaṃ prasaṅgeneti / anena tvanekasvabhāvarāhityamavagamya nirābhāsopāyasandarśanena yogasamāpattiścittaprahaśceti nirdiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:387_1: bahuḥ sa paramāṇusañcayo bhavet ityanenaudāryaṃ cābhihitam,
SA14kamvchtu:389_0: samprati sattvalokābhāvaprasthitimadhikṛtya bhāṣitastrisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhāturiti saḥ ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:389_3: ata eva adhātuḥ sa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ iti pañcaskandhātmakaḥ sa sattvaloko 'pyekānekasvabhāvavirahitaḥ pūrvavaduktaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:390_0: anena tathāgatasya tathāvidhāyāṃ sattvalokābhāvaprasthitau bodhisattvena chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti nirdiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:390_1: nirābhāsena tu yogasamāpattiriyaṃ kathaṃ pratipattavyetyapi sandarśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:391_0: idānīṃ cittaṃ kathaṃ pragrahītavyamiti darśayituṃ tatkasya hetoḥ? iti pṛṣṭavān /
SA14kamvchtu:391_2: ityanena yojanīyam / uttarārthaṃ saced bhagavan ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:391_3: yadi sattvaloko yathāprasiddhastathā paramārthataḥ syāt sthūlaikasvabhāvastadā tathāgatena yathāsthiti vastutattvamadhigatamiti sa eva [Vajraṭ_221] piṇḍagrāhaḥ syāt /
SA14kamvchtu:392_1: sa eva ca tathāgatasya piṇḍagrāho 'tigāḍhataraḥ syāt,
SA14kamvchtu:392_3: na tvevam, ata evānyatra yo bālajanebhyaḥ piṇḍagrāha ātmagrāhasya hetutvena bhagavatā bhāṣitaḥ sa paramārthato 'grāhya eva /
SA14kamvchtu:392_6: tenocyate piṇḍagrāha iti / tadarthasādhanāyaivaṃ bhagavān piṇḍagrāasyārthamuktavān /
SA14kamvchtu:392_7: kimucyata iti cet? vyavahāre piṇḍagrāha iti paramārthe 'bhāvāt sa dharmastvanabhilāpya ityuktavān /
SA14kamvchtu:393_0: yadyevaṃ grāhyaḥ piṇḍo na syāt tadā tatra grāhakasyāpyabhāvāt kathaṃ vyavahāre piṇḍagrāha iti vicintyāha- sa ca bālapṛthajanairudgṛhītaḥ iti /
SA14kamvchtu:393_4: tasmāt te bālā ityucyante, anyathā yathāvastu vyavahāraprajñaptau kathaṃ te bālāḥ syuḥ?
SA14kamvchtu:394_2: anena yadā sarve bhāvāḥ paramārthataḥ svabhāvaśūnyāstadā rūpakāyaḥ jñānakāyaśca kathaṃ bhavet paramārthataḥ sasvabhāvaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:395_0: samprati yo hi kaścit subhūte ityādinā sarvasthāneṣu yogasamāpatteḥ kenopāyena sarvatra samādheyamiti tat pradarśyate /
SA14kamvchtu:395_1: evamanusandhiḥ- yadi nāsti piṇḍagrāhastadā tanmūlaprabhavāyāḥ satkāyadṛṣṭerevābhāvāt kathaṃ bhagavān pañcasu dṛṣṭiṣu satkāyadṛṣṭimāheti tadarthaṃ yo hi kaścit subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:395_2: atra kathamavikalpyam, yaścāvikalpakaḥ, yaminnavikalpyam, yenāvikalpakaḥ, yaścāvikalpaḥ, taddarśanena yogasamāpatteḥ samyagupāyo darśito bhavati /
SA14kamvchtu:396_1: tatra yo hi kaścit subhūte ityārabhya tenocyate ātmadṛṣṭiḥ etatparyantamanena kathamavikalpyaṃ taduddiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:396_3: bhagavatā tu pudgalanairātmyapratipādanādātmaniṣedhārthamāha ātmadṛṣṭiḥ iti tasyāḥ ātmadṛṣṭernirākaraṇena dharmanairātmyaṃ vyavasthāpyate adṛṣṭiḥ sā tathāgatena bhāṣitā ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:396_4: tāmātmadṛṣṭiṃ yadi satyato na gṛhṇāti (tadā) evaṃ prayoge bodhisattvo yogasamāpattau pravartate /
SA14kamvchtu:397_0: evaṃ hi subhūtea bodhisattvayānasamprasthitena ityanena yo 'vikalpakaḥ sa paridīpyate /
SA14kamvchtu:397_2: jñātavyā draṣṭavyā adhimoktavyāḥ ityanena yenāvikalpyaṃ tadabhihitam /
SA14kamvchtu:397_3: kenāvikalpyamitiṃ cet? jñānena darśanena adhimuktyā ca /
SA14kamvchtu:397_5: darśanaṃ cintāyayī prajñā, tayopanidhyānatvād, adhimuktiḥ bhāvanāmayī prajñā,
SA14kamvchtu:398_0: tathā cādhimoktavyā, yathā na pratyupasthāmahe ityanena yo 'vikalpastaṃ darśayati /
SA14kamvchtu:398_1: asaṃjñaiṣā tathāgatena bhāṣitā ityatra hetuḥ parikīrtitaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:398_5: tasyā [Vajraṭ_223] mithyārthādhigamāvasthāyāṃ kathaṃ na syādavikalpa ityabhiprāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:400_1: saṃsārāsaṃkleśaśca / tatra yadi nāsti dharmasaṃjñā tadā tathāgatasya sattvebhyo taddharmadeśanāsaṃjñāsamutpāde kathaṃ na bhavet saṃkleśaḥ? kṛpayā sattvārthaṃ yāvatsaṃsārāvasthāne sati dharmasaṃjñayā kathaṃ na syāt saṃkleśaḥ? iti vicintya tayaiva cittasampadā deśanāsaṃkleśaṃ gāthayā ca saṃsārākleśamāvedayitum yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:401_4: dhārayet iti padam, vācayet iti pustakāsikaṃ vācayet,
SA14kamvchtu:401_6: anena yamānmahārtho 'yaṃ dharmastasmādbodhisattvenaivaṃvidhāyāṃ mahārthadharmadeśanāyāmavaśyameva chanda-praṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyaṃ tatparidīpitam /
SA14kamvchtu:402_0: bhāṣyamāṇāyāmapi kathaṃ na syātsaṃkleśa ityetaddarśayituṃ kathaṃ na samprakāśayet ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:402_3: evamuktam- yathā vineyajanāstathā sarve dharmā ādito 'nutpannatvādanabhilāpyāḥ [Vajraṭ_224] tasmānna te kenāpi vyapadeśyā ityevaṃ darśyata iti /
SA14kamvchtu:402_6: ata eva tathāgato dharmadeśanākāle viśuddhalokajñāne prasthitaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:404_0: sāmprataṃ nikhilaprajñāpāramitākāyaṃ vyavasthāpya gāthayā saṃsārāsaṃkleśo deśyate /
SA14kamvchtu:405_0: tatra pañcaskandhātmakānāṃ bhāvānāṃ yathāpratīti pratītyasamutpādastāvad hetupratyayasaṃgṛhitatvāt saṃskṛtaṃ ityucyate /
SA14kamvchtu:405_1: eteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ svabhāvaḥ tārakāḥ iva draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:405_3: na tu divase, tathaiva saṃskṛtā api avidyājñānāndhakāre sati pratibhāsante,
SA14kamvchtu:406_0: vijñānalakṣaṇaṃ ca karmavartikaṃ tṛṣṇāsnehaṃ cāśritya prajvalanād dāpa iva draṣṭavyam,
SA14kamvchtu:406_3: vitathāvabhāsamānatvāt / tatrādīnavānvayalakṣaṇaṃ saṃskṛtasvabhāvaṃ dvividham- anityānvayaḥ duḥkhānvayaśca /
SA14kamvchtu:406_5: na ciraṃ sthitatvāt / budbudopamayā tāvad [Vajraṭ_225] duḥkhatānvayaḥ pradarśyate,
SA14kamvchtu:406_6: vedanā budbudopamā iti, yā kācid vedanā seha duḥkhamiti bhāṣitatvāt /
SA14kamvchtu:407_0: trividhaiḥ dukhaiḥ sarvā vedanā duḥkhā veditavyā /
SA14kamvchtu:407_5: na duḥkhā na sukhā vedanā, tatsahitāni vastūni ca saṃskāraduḥkham,
SA14kamvchtu:410_2: tatra ye tāvadatītāste smṛtimātrāvasthitā ato niḥsvabhāvatvena,
SA14kamvchtu:410_5: pratyupannā vidyudaupamyena ekānekasvabhāvarahitāḥ agrāhyasvabhāvatvaditi tenānvitā vyapadiṣṭāḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:410_7: abhraupamyena ākāśasamacitte tadbījadauṣṭhulyena janitatvāditi nairātmyadvayaṃ tāvaddeśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:411_0: ato 'nena khalu samagreṇātra bodhisattvaiḥ sadā sarvasaṃskṛtasvabhāvamevaṃ vicārya chanda-praṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti paridīpitam /
SA14kamvchtu:412_0: gāthāyāmasyāṃ tāvadidaṃ paridīpyate- saṃkleśamulaṃ tāvad viparyāsaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:412_1: ataḥ saṃskṛtasvabhāveṣvanekaśaḥ kenacid vicārayatā manasikurvatā apyevaṃ saṃskāraparijñānādyadā viparyāsābhāvāt na bhavati saṃkleśaṃ (tadā) kathaṃ (nāma) yathāvadaśesavastusvabhāvaparibhāvako vidhūtāśeṣaviparyāsajālastathāgataḥ saṃkliṣṭo bhavet /
SA14kamvchtu:412_5: saphalakāritraḥ, mahākaruṇānvitacittaḥ, niravadhijagaddhitasukhasādhanābhiprāyeṇa saṃsāracakrasaṃsaraṇaṃ yāvat pratiṣṭhito veditavyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:413_0: kartuṃ loke sukhaṃ śāntau bhave cāpyanadhiṣṭhitaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:414_0: traiyadhvikānāṃ jananī munīnāṃ khyātā yathāśakti mayā tato jagat /
SA14kamvchtu:414_1: vipulena puṇyena viyatsamena vidhūya cāndhyaṃ sugatatvamāpnuyāt //
SA14kamvchtu:415_0: ācāryakamalaśīlena mādhyamikanayena viracitā vistṛtā āryavajracchedikāṭīkā parisamāptā /
SA14kamvchtu:415_1: aṣṭamyāṃ śatābdyāṃ bhāratīyācārya mañjuśrīmitreṇa bhota-locāvā yeśe-demahābhāgena ca bhoṭabhāṣāyāmanūditā /
SA14kamvchtu:415_2: viduṣāṃ vaśaṃvadena ācāryapemātenajinamahādayena bhoṭabhāṣātaḥ saṃskṛtabhāṣāyāṃ punaruddhṛtā sarvasattvahitasukhārtham iti /
